RESUMEN AUTOMATICO

Resumen automático

'We' have detected frequent alternative splicing of a gene that encodes 'NER,' a protein homologous to the retinoic acid 'receptors,' in cancer cells. 'This' observation may imply that the aberrant 'NER' product has some relation to the development 'and/or' progression of cancers in a variety of human tissues. 'Genotoxic' agents produce numerous cellular responses that are principally dedicated to maintain or restore 'DNA' integrity. 'Some' proteins directly or indirectly involved in 'NER' also fulfill other functions such as 'transcription,' 'DNA' damage checkpoints or cell cycle. 'Moreover,' our results suggest that this response could be mediated by cell cycle regulatory proteins in a 'p53-independent' manner. 'The' estrogen receptor ( 'ER)' and aryl hydrocarbon receptor ( 'AhR)' are 'ligand-activated' transcription factors involved in estrogen or xenobiotic 'exposure,' whereas the 90-kDa heat shock protein ( 'HSP90),' which is a ubiquitously expressed molecular 'chaperone,' is involved in the signal transduction process. 'Although' the interactions between these pathways have been under 'investigation,' the mechanisms are unclear and the potential role of 'HSP90' in these interactions has not been reported. 'These' findings indicate a potential role of 'HSP90' where competition between 'AhR' and 'ER' for binding to 'HSP90' can occur and cause reciprocal inhibition. 'However,' the effect of 'PFOA' on gill mRNA levels of their potential 'regulators,' aryl hydrocarbon receptor ( 'AhR)' for 'CYP1A,' and pregnane 'X' receptor ( 'PXR)' for 'CYP3A,' were not consistent with the observed effects of 'PFOA' on the corresponding 'CYP' mRNA concentrations. 'Here,' we examined a novel function of 'Sigma' 1 receptor ( 'Sigmar1)' in regulating 'CHOP' expression under 'ER' stress in cardiomyocytes. 'We' used 'adenovirus-mediated' 'Sigmar1' overexpression as well as 'Sigmar1' knockdown by siRNA in neonatal rat ventricular cardiomyocytes ( 'NRCs);' to induce 'ER' 'stress,' cardiomyocytes were treated with tunicamycin. 'Sigmar1-siRNA' knockdown significantly increased the expression of 'CHOP' and significantly induced cellular toxicity by sustained activation of 'ER' stress in cardiomyocytes. 'Using' biochemical and immunocytochemical 'experiments,' we also defined the specific 'ER-stress' pathway associated with 'Sigmar1-dependent' regulation of 'CHOP' expression and cellular toxicity. 'In' this 'study,' we sequenced 5.3 kb upstream of the translation start codon of the porcine 'GR' 'gene,' and identified seven alternative 5 '\''-untranslated exons 1-4 ',' 1-5 ',' 1-6 ',' 1-7 ',' 1-8 ',' 1-9 ',' 10 and 1-11. 'In' 'contrast,' 'GR' binding to promoters of exons 1-4 and 1-5 was significantly diminished in 'LW' 'piglets,' implicating the presence of negative 'GREs'. 'Using' an 'RNA' silencing 'approach,' we found that downregulation of 'RACK1' expression in 'HeLa' and 'A673' tumor cells markedly suppressed the proliferation and invasion of these cells in vitro and tumor development in vivo. 'It' is ubiquitously 'expressed,' and has been shown to be important in numerous cellular processes including cell 'growth,' stress 'response,' and apoptosis. 'This' timely review shows aspects of 'SAFB1,' which are proving to have a complexity far greater than was previously thought. 'Endogenous' 'IP(3)Rs' provide very appealing tools for studying the 'ubiquitin-proteasome' pathway in intact mammalian cells 'because,' upon 'activation,' they are rapidly ubiquitinated and degraded. 'Remarkably,' the attached 'Lys-48-' and 'Lys-63-linked' ubiquitin chains are homogeneous and are segregated to separate 'IP(3)R' 'subunits,' and 'Lys-48-linked' ubiquitin 'chains,' but not 'Lys-63-linked' 'chains,' are required for 'IP(3)R' degradation. 'Transcriptional' regulation of the genes that encode them is central to gaining a deeper understanding of the diversity of their biochemical and biophysical roles and their role in disease and therapy. 'Even' though they share evolutionary 'history,' nuclear receptor genes have fundamentally different expression 'patterns,' ranging from ubiquitously expressed to 'tissue-specific' and spatiotemporally complex. 'On' the other hand nuclear receptor genes that are involved in 'tissue-specific' roles lack these 'features,' having simple transcriptional controls and a greater variety of mechanisms for producing paralogs. 'To' 'date,' no studies have investigated the distribution of inhibitory neurotransmitters such as 'γ-aminobutyric' acid ( 'GABA)' and their respective receptors on the different cell types in the human 'SVZ'. 'GABA(A)' receptors ( 'GABA(A)R)' are ubiquitously 'expressed,' inhibitory heteropentameric chloride ion channels comprised of a variety of subunits that are targeted by many prescribed drugs. 'Therefore,' perturbation induced by these orphan receptors at multiple 'levels,' including 'DNA' binding 'activities,' receptor 'homo-' or 'heterodimerization,' recruitment of cofactor 'proteins,' communication with general transcriptional 'machinery,' and changes at histone acetylation status and chromatin 'structures,' may contribute to silencing of target gene expression in a specific promoter or 'cell-type' context. 'SHP' ( small heterodimer 'partner)' is a 'well-known' 'NR' ( nuclear 'receptor)' 'co-regulator'. 'Notably,' 40 '%' 'CR' increased 'TDCA' by over 1000 '%' ( 'serum,' 'liver,' and 'gallbladder)'. 'LXRs' stimulate lipogenesis whereas 'FXRs' inhibit the metabolic process. 'Small' heterodimer partner represses hepatocyte nuclear 'factor-4α-mediated' transactivation of 'CYP2D6'. 'Chemicals' that increase 'SHP' expression ( e. 'The' 34 'G,' 93 'D,' and 139 'H-alleles' were rare 'variants,' which were found only among obese subjects. 'Moreover,' we showed that 'FOXA2-dependent' promoter activation of 'BAX' and p21 genes is significantly reduced via physical interactions between the identified binding partners and 'FOXA2'. 'This' study reports that 'Shp-1' knockout 'HSCs' have attenuated quiescence and impaired 'long-term' 'self-renewal'. 'Mechanistically,' 'SHP-1' interacts with the immunoreceptor 'tyrosine-based' inhibition motif on 'TGF-β' receptor 1 and is critical for 'TGF-β' signaling activation in 'HSCs'. 'DSHN' transcriptionally activated 'Shp' 'mRNA,' but also stabilized the 'SHP' protein by preventing its ubiquitination and degradation. 'Here,' adenoviral overexpression of 'ChREBP' and 'SHP' in rat primary hepatocytes induced and suppressed 'Mttp' 'mRNA,' respectively.

'(', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, the, 'HAT-enhancing', effect, is, independent, of, the, 'well-documented', 'E2A-CBP', interaction]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, rapid, and, sustained, inhibition, '(', &, 'gt;50%)', of, cholesterol, synthesis, in, the, whole, small, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', hepatic, cholesterol, 'synthesis,', while, markedly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['initially,', rebounded, to, higher, than, baseline, rates, within, 7, days])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, expression, for, multiple, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, intestinal, cholesterol, regulation, including, 'NPC1L1', was, mostly, unchanged, although, there, was, a, marked, rise, in, the, mRNA, level, for, the, 'PXR', target, genes, 'CYP3A11', and, 'CES2A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([regular]), complemento([consumption, of, both, probiotic, bacteria, and, yeast, has, been, associated, with, improvement, in, the, serum, lipid, profile])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, present, review, aims, to, describe, and, discuss, the, potential, mechanisms, responsible, for, the, hypocholesterolaemic, effect, of]), verbo([regular]), complemento([consumption, of, probiotic, bacteria, and, yeast])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regarding', the, hypocholesterolaemic, effect, of, probiotic, 'bacteria,', the, potential, mechanisms, responsible, 'include:', deconjugation, of, bile, 'salts;', modulation, of, lipid, 'metabolism;', and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([absorption, of, intestinal, cholesterol, through, 'co-precipitation', of, intestinal, cholesterol, with, the, deconjugated, bile, 'salts,', incorporation, and, assimilation, of, cholesterol, in, the, cell, membrane, of, the, 'probiotics,', the, enterocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([regular]), complemento([consumption, of, probiotic, bacteria, and, 'yeast,', as, a, 'non-pharmaceutical', approach, to, help, manage, cardiovascular, 'risk,', holds, 'promise,', according, to, the, beneficial, hypocholesterolaemic, effects, described, herein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Statins', are, used, daily, by, a, large, and]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([number, of, individuals, worldwide])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies, on, 'HCV', chronically, infected, individuals]), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, that, their, use, in, vivo, in, combination, with, 'PEG-IFN', and, ribavirin, favor, the, sustained, viral, response, '(', 'SVR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, all, tested, statins, exert, a, proviral, effect, through, the, upregulation, of, 'LDLR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', at, higher, 'concentration,', we, also]), 'PXR', inhibited, 'TBC-elicited', lipid, uptake])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([critical, mechanistic, insight, for, understanding, the, impact, of, cholesterol, absorption, 'inhibitor,', blocks, the, endocytosis, of, 'NPC1L1', thereby]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([cholesterol, uptake])]). relacion([sujeto([human, 'NPC1L1', contains, seven, small, cytoplasmic, 'loops--four', small, and, three, large, luminal, 'loops--one', of, which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, bind, ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', defined, topology, of, 'NPC1L1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([necessary, information, for, further, dissecting, the, functions, of, the, different, domains, of, 'NPC1L1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', 'C1-like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1)', is, an, intestinal, cholesterol, transporter, and, the, molecular]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'ezetimibe,', a, cholesterol, absorption, inhibitor, demonstrated, to, reduce, 'LDL-cholesterol', '(', 'LDL-C)', both, as, monotherapy, and, when, 'co-administered', with, 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl', coenzyme, 'A', cholesterol, absorption, and, 'LDL-C', reductions, at, both, baseline, and, post, ezetimibe, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrate, that, 'DNA', sequence, variants, in, 'NPC1L1', are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, an, improvement, in, response, to, ezetimibe, pharmacotherapy, and, suggest, that, detailed, analysis, of, genetic, variability, in, clinical, trial, cohorts, can, lead, to, improved, understanding, of, factors, contributing, to, variable, drug, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ezetimibe', is, a, novel, 'lipid-lowering', agent, that]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([intestinal, absorption, of, dietary, and, biliary, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', effects, of, ezetimibe, on, 'low-density', lipoprotein, '(', 'LDL)-cholesterol', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, generally, consistent, across, all, subgroups, 'analyzed,', including, baseline, lipid, 'profile,', 'hypertension,', diabetes, 'mellitus,', and, body, mass, index])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', 'C1', like, 1, '(', 'NPC1L1)', protein, is, recently]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, critical, for, intestinal, cholesterol, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, de, novo, cholesterol, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([data, from, a, large, cohort, of, 56, 'Czech', patients, 'above-mentioned', amplification, 'factors,', the, current]), verbo([responded]), complemento([to, 'HE4', linearly, in, the, concentration, range, of, 3, -, 300, pM, under, optimal, detection, 'conditions,', with, a, detection, limit, of, 0.06, pM])]). relacion([sujeto(['Downstream', from, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([signal, 'peptide-coding', 'sequence,', the, 5, '\'', -, regions, contained, at, least, six, 'mini-exons', of, less, than, 50, nucleotides])]). relacion([sujeto(['Multiple', splice, variants]), verbo([involving]), complemento([these, 'mini-exons', were, cloned, in, the, 'human,', the, majority, of, which, was, also, found, in, rodents])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', sets, of, peptides, were, chosen, for, antibody, 'production,', assuming, that, protein, scission, had, occurred, within, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['GPS-motif'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deglycosylation', experiments, showed, that, the, large, ectosubunits, were, 'NPC1', gene, can, be]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, majority, of, 'NPC', 'patients,', who, accumulate, massive, amounts, of, cholesterol, and, other, lipids, in, the, 'LE/LY', due, to, a, defect, in, intracellular, lipid, trafficking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atherosclerosis', is, the, pathological, basis, of, coronary, heart, 'disease,', one, of, the, major]), verbo([causes]), complemento([of, death, worldwide])]). relacion([sujeto(['NPC1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, play, a, critical, role, in, the, atherosclerotic, progression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([summarized, the, role, of, 'NPC1', in, regulating, intracellular, cholesterol, trafficking, and, atherosclerosis])]). relacion([sujeto([')', 'Anionic', lipids]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([cholesterol, transfer, between, liposomes, while, 'SM', inhibits, 'it,', even, in, the, presence, of, anionic, 'bis(monoacylglycero)phosphate', '(', 'BMP)'])]). relacion([sujeto([4.12, ')', results, in, hydrolysis, of, 'SM', to, ceramide, '(', 'Cer),', which]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([cholesterol, transfer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Anionic', phospholipids, derived, from, the, plasma, membrane, '(', phosphatidylglycerol, and, phosphatidic, 'acid)']), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['SM', and, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SM', degradation, by, 'ASM', is, required, for, physiological, secretion, of, cholesterol, from, the, late, endosomal, 'compartment,', and, is, a, key, 'accretion,', which, may]), verbo([cause]), complemento([gradual, 'neurodegeneration,', and, we, reveal, how, 'β-cyclodextrin,', a, potential, therapeutic, 'drug,', reverts, these, changes])]). that, 'WT', 'NPC2', promotes, 'vesicle-vesicle', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', interactions, were, 'abrogated,', 'however,', by, mutations]), verbo([causing]), complemento([defective, sterol, transfer, properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['Molecular', modeling, shows, that, 'NPC2', is, highly, 'plastic,', with, several, intense, positively, charged, regions, across, the, surface, cardiovascular, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'mice,', the, 'Niemann-Pick', type, 'C1', 'Like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1)', gene, is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, intestine, and, complemento([not, been, well, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['Insect', 'NPC1', genes, were, grouped, into, two, 'sister-clades,', 'NPC1a', and, 'NPC1b,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, likely, 'α-hydroxycholecalciferol', in, the, treatment, of, severe, vitamin, 'D', deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['Human', adenoviruses, '(', 'Ads)', generally]), verbo([cause]), complemento([mild, 'self-limiting', infections, but, can, lead, to, serious, disease, and, even, be, fatal, in, 'high-risk', 'individuals,', underscoring, the, importance, of, understanding, how, the, virus, counteracts, host, defense, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['First,', we, wished, to, determine, the, molecular, basis, of, cholesterol, homeostatic, responses]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, early, region, 3, membrane, protein, 'RIDα', via, its, direct, interaction, with, the, 'sterol-binding', protein, 'ORP1L,', a, member, of, the, evolutionarily, conserved, family, of, complemento([innate, immunity, to, adenovirus])]). relacion([sujeto(['ORP1L', is, known, to, form, highly, dynamic, contacts, with, endoplasmic, 'reticulum-resident', 'VAP', proteins, that]), factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['RIDα-induced', lipid, trafficking, also, attenuated, proinflammatory, signaling, by, 'Toll-like', receptor, 4, ',', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, central, immunity, to, adenovirus, in, endosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['IMPORTANCE', 'Early', region, 3, proteins, encoded, by, human, adenoviruses, that, attenuate, 'immune-mediated', pathology]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, a, particularly, rich, source, of, information, regarding, intracellular, protein, trafficking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', studies, with, the, early, region, 3, -, encoded, 'RIDα', protein, also]), verbo([provided]), complemento([fundamental, new, information, regarding, mechanisms, of, nonvesicular, lipid, transport, and, the, flow, of, molecular, information, at, membrane, contacts, between, different, organelles])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', type, 'C1', disease, '(', 'NPC1)', is, a, rare, progressive, neurodegenerative, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, 'NPC1', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', neurological, manifestation, of, the, disease, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, dysfunction, and, cell, death, in, the, central, nervous, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', a, human, model, using, 'patient-specific']), verbo([induced]), complemento([pluripotent, stem, cells, 100, pairs, of, 'PTC', tissue, and, their, adjacent, 'non-tumor', counterparts, further, showed, that, 'AGRN', '(', n, =, 98, ')', ',', 'CTSC', '(', n, =, 99, ')', ',', 'ERAP2', '(', n, =, 98, ')', by, 'PCR', and, then, cloned, into, prokaryotic, expression, vector, 'pGEX-4T-1,']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, purified, by, recombinant, 'DNA', techniques])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', enhanced, activity, against, soluble, ester, 'substrates,', and, 'hydrogen-deuterium', exchange, '(', 'HDX)', mass, spectrometry, revealed, that, the, 'LCAT', lid, is, extremely, dynamic, in, weeks, of, 'age,', and, the, remaining, 'Purkinje', cells, exhibited, a, 50, '%', reduction, in, spike, rate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, data, highlight, the, complexity, of, 'PGC-1α', deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence, strongly, implicates, the, transcriptional, coactivator, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, γ, coactivator, 1, α, 'fruits,', and, fish, per, 'week;', less, takeaway, foods, per, 'week;', and, greater, salt, intake, control])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', were, significant, mediational, effects, of, the]), and, immune, cell, chemotaxis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, assessed, oxysterol, levels, in, subset, of, 'CD4+', 'T', cells, and, demonstrated, that, 25, -, 'OHC', and, transcript, levels, of, complemento([recently, been, linked, with, the, induction, of, a, cellular, antiviral, state])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, the, expression, of, the, complemento([by, type, 'I', 'IFNs,', contrasting, previous, reports, on, mammalian, orthologs])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', the, 'interferon-independent', antiviral, role, of, 25, 'HC', was, extended, to, a, 'non-mammalian', species, for, the, first, 'time,', and, dual, activity, that, both, protects, the, cells, and]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, virus, cannot, be, discarded])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', 25, -, hydroxylase, '(', 'CH25H)']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, identified, as, a, host, restriction, factor, that, exerts, antiviral, effects, by, catalyzing, the, production, of, 25, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 25, 'HC)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['CH25H', can, be, rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([upon, infection, with, some, viruses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Porcine', reproductive, and, respiratory, syndrome, virus, '(', 'PRRSV),', an, 'arterivirus,']), verbo([has]), complemento([ranked, among, the, most, important, swine, pathogens, since, it, was, discovered, in, the, late, 1980, s])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'PRRSV', infection, significantly, downregulated, the, expression, of, 'CH25H', in, cells, by, a, 'so-far', unknown, 'mechanism,', suggesting, that, 'CH25H', exerts, antiviral, activity, against, 'PRRSV'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', glycosylation, and, reduced, 'ligand-binding', affinity, of, 'α-DG'])]). relacion([sujeto(['LARGE', is, a, bifunctional, glycosyltransferase, that, alternately, transfers, xylose, and, glucuronic, 'acid,', thereby, generating, the, heteropolysaccharides, on, 'α-DG', that]), verbo([confer]), complemento([its, ligand, binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, 'LARGE', paralog, 'LARGE2', '(', also, referred, to, as, 'GYLTL1B)']), verbo([has]), complemento([likewise, been, shown, to, enhance, the, functional, modification, of, 'α-DG', in, cultured, 'cells,', its, enzymatic, activities, have, not, been, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LARGE2', is, also, a, bifunctional, glycosyltransferase, and, compare, its, properties, with, those, of, 'LARGE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', means, of, a, 'high-performance', liquid, 'chromatography-based', enzymatic, 'assay,', we, demonstrate, that, like, 'LARGE,', 'LARGE2']), verbo([has]), complemento([xylosyltransferase, '(', 'Xyl-T)', and, glucuronyltransferase, '(', 'GlcA-T)', 'activities,', as, well, as, polymerizing, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LARGE', and, 'LARGE2', catalyze, the, same, glycosylation, reactions, for, the, functional, modification, of, 'α-DG,', but, that, they, have, different, biochemical, properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['XXT1', and, 'XXT2']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, been, shown, to, encode, 'XyG', 'α-1,6-xylosyltransferases,', while, knockout, mutants, of, a, 'third,', 'XXT5,', exhibit, decreased, 'XyG', 'content,', suggesting, a, similar, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', enzyme, activity, of, 'XXTs', was, investigated, using, recombinant, protein]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'E'])]). relacion([sujeto(['XyG', analysis, of, single, and, double, 'T-DNA', insertion, 'knockouts,', together, with, overexpression, of, 'GT34s', in, selected, mutant, 'lines,']), verbo([provided]), complemento([detailed, function, of, each, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, third, member, of, 0.02, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento(['LARGE', as, the, first, known, modifier, of, plasma, 'antithrombin,', and, proposes, a, new, role, for, 'LARGE', in, modulating, extracellular, secretion, of, certain, glycoproteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies, demonstrated, that, mutations, in, 'B3GNT1,', an, enzyme, proposed, to, be]), 'dystroglycanopathies)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([this, enzyme, is, not, a, 'β-1,3-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase', with, catalytic, activity, towards, 'β-galactose', but, rather, a, 'β-1,4-glucuronyltransferase,', designated, 'B4GAT1,', towards, both, 'α-', and, 'β-anomers', of, xylose])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'dual-activity', 'LARGE', enzyme, be]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, low, levels, until, the, need, arises, for, cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['How', temporal, and, spatial, trafficking, of, 'PA', affects, its]), 'PA', cycles, back, and, forth, from, the, cellular, membrane, to, the, 'nucleus,', affecting, the, function, of, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF),', in, a, process, that, involves, 'PPARα/LXRα', in, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', 'PA']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['EGFR', 'expression,', a, role, compatible, with, the, mitogenic, ability, of, the, phospholipid])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, 'PLD+PA', combination, impedes]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'PPARα/LXRα', to, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', if, proliferation, initiation, and, its, maintenance, in, cancer, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR),', a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, 'receptor,', is, an, essential, regulator, of, immune, responses])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, adverse, effects, of, these, conventional, 'LXR', agonists, in, elevating, liver, lipids]), verbo([have]), complemento([impeded, exploitation, of, this, intriguing, mechanism, for, chronic, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', treatment, with, 'LXR', agonists, dramatically]), complemento([evidence, for, the, development, of, 'sterol-based', 'LXR', agonists, as, novel, therapeutics, for, chronic, inflammatory, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', 'X', 'Receptors', '(', 'LXRs)', α, and, β, are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, able, to, bind, oxidative, forms, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'adult,', 'LXR', activation, by, the, synthetic, agonist, 'TO901317', significantly]), verbo([increases]), complemento([myelin, gene, mRNA, amount, in, the, cerebellum, but, not, in, the, other, regions, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['Invalidation', of, the, sole, 'LXRβ', isoform]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, decreased, 'PLP', and, 'MBP', mRNA, levels, in, all, the, structures, except, the, spinal, 'cord,', while, the, knock, out, of, both, isoforms, '(', 'LXR', 'dKO)', decreases, myelin, gene, mRNA, amounts, in, all, the, regions, tested, except, the, corpus, callosum])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', during, myelination, process, '(', 'post-natal', day, 21, ')', ',', both, cerebellum, and, optic, nerve, display, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, myelin, gene, mRNA, levels, in, 'LXR', dKO, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', within, the, 'CNS,', each, 'LXR', isoform, differentially, 'interferon-stimulated', 'IFIT-1', protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['First,', we, showed, that, nsp16]), verbo([recruited]), complemento(['N7-methylated', capped, 'RNA', and, 'SAM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'SAM']), verbo([binding]), complemento([promotes, the, assembly, of, the, enzymatically, active, 'nsp10/nsp16', complex, that, converted, 7, mGpppG, '(', 'cap-0)', into, 7, to, known, 'MTase', 'inhibitors,', such, as, sinefungin, and, cap, analogues])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', characterization, of, the, 'MERS-CoV', 2, '\'', -, 'O-MTase', is, a, preliminary, step, toward, the, development, of, molecules, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([cap, 2, '\'', -, 'O', methylation, and, to, restore, the, host, antiviral, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['IMPORTANCE', show, that, 'SAM']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, formation, of, the, active, 'nsp10/nsp16', complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', after, cap, 'methylation,', the, reaction, turnover, is, speeded, up, by, 'cap-1', 'RNA']), verbo([release]), complemento([and, 'nsp10/nsp16', complex, 'dissociation,', at, the, low, intracellular, 'SAH', concentration])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SAM/SAH', balance, is, a, regulator, of, the, 2, '\'', -, 'O-methyltransferase', activity, and, raises, the, possibility, that, 'SAH', hydrolase, to, identify, nsp16, residues, involved, in, 'cap-0', 'RNA', recognition, and, to, understand, the, action, mode, of, known, methyltransferase, inhibitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'JEV', 'MTase', is, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, antiviral, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'RNA', aptamer, efficiently]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([viral, cap, methylation, activity, of, 'MTase', and, interfered, with, 'JEV', production, in, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we, generated, a, 24, -, mer, truncated, aptamer, that, could, complemento(['JEV', production, and, replication, in, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, cap, 'structure,', which, is, added, to, nascent, 'RNA', pol, 'II', 'transcripts,']), verbo([recruits]), complemento([a, novel, role, for, 'PBX1', in, the, regulation, of, lipid, metabolism, genes, in, benign, 'breast,', which, may, contribute, to, 'ER-negative', tumorigenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', this, protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, contribute, to, cellular, development, and, 'tumorigenesis,', the, role, of, 'PBX1', in, gastric, carcinoma, '(', 'GC)', remains, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, observed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'PBX1', in, 'GC', tissues, compared, with, adjacent, normal, patients, presenting, pituitary, hormone, deficiency]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, ectopic, or, nonvisible, posterior, pituitary, and, developmental, ocular, defects])]). in, '"', 'variant"', cells, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, detectable, 'NPC1', protein, and, residual, capability, to, upregulate, expression, of, 'ABCA1', in, response, to, 'LDL'])]). and, common, neurodegenerative, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', filovirus, surface, glycoprotein, '(', 'GP)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([viral, entry, into, host, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', studies, indicate, that]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GP', to, its, endosomal, receptor, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1', occurs, in, two, distinct, 'stages:', the, initial, relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we, demonstrate, that, monoclonal, antibodies]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, filovirus, 'RBS', neutralize, all, known, filovirus, 'GPs,', making, this, receptor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, occur])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, crystal, structure, of, the, cleaved, form, of, 'Ebola', virus, 'GP'])]). termed, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1', '(', 'NPC1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', perform, mutagenesis, to]), verbo([find]), complemento([parts, of, the, site, essential, for, binding, 'NPC1', and, map, /, -, 0.4, versus, 3.1, +, /, -, 1.1, 'ng/ml;', 115, +, /, -, 48, versus, 361, +, /, -, 102, 'microg/day,', both, p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, serum, concentrations, of, 'GLUC', were, manyfold]), verbo([increased]), complemento([compared, with, wild, type, '(', 196, +, /, -, 76, versus, 23, +, /, -, 25, 'ng/ml;', p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', associated, with, elevated, renal, excretion, and, decreased, intestinal, clearance, '(', 7.8, +, /, -, 3.1, versus, 0.4, +, /, -, 0.4, 'microg/day,', p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ;, 0.3, +, /, -, 0.3, versus, 15, +, /, -, 17, 'ml/min;', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Disposition', of, 'EZ', may]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, additionally, influenced, by, hepatic, 'P-gp,', 'Mrp3,', and, 'Ugt1a1,', which, were, expressed, significantly, higher, in, 'Mrp2-deficient', rats])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mrp2', deficiency, in, rats, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, decreased, 'sterol-lowering', effect, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, activation, of, 'PPAR', family, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['β-carotene', uptake, in, 'Caco-2/TC7', cells, was]), verbo([inhibited]), 'NPC1L1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further,', 'EPA', also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, expression, of, carnitine, palmitoyl, transferase, 1, 'A', '(', 'CPT1A)', 'expression,', a, 'HDAC', inhibitors]), verbo([requires]), complemento([further, 'study,', but, these, drugs, increase, the, level, of, the, 'NPC1', protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ants', are, eusocial, insects, that, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, most, regions, of, the, world])]). relacion([sujeto(['Within', its, 'caste,', worker, ants, are, responsible, for, various, tasks, that, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, colony, maintenance])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, hypothesized, that, semiochemicals, are, recognized, by, 'α-helical', carrier, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', number, of, these, 'proteins,', 'however,', is, not, sufficient, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, a, large, number, of, semiochemicals, estimated, from, chemosensory, receptor, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'ligand-binding', pocket, of, 'CjapNPC2', was, composed, of, a, flexible, 'β-structure', that, allowed, it, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, a, wide, range, of, potential, semiochemicals])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'vertebrates,', 'NPC2']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, essential, carrier, protein, for, cholesterol, from, late, endosomes, and, lysosomes, to, other, cellular, organelles])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, ants]), verbo([have]), complemento([evolved, an, 'NPC2', with, a, malleable, 'ligand-binding', pocket, as, a, moderately, selective, carrier, protein, in, the, sensillum, cavity, of, the, basiconic, sensillum])]). relacion([sujeto(['CjapNPC2', might, be, able, to, deliver, tasks])]). relacion([sujeto(['With', the, wide, adoption, of, transcriptome, sequencing, an, ever]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([amount, of, information, is, becoming, 'available,', together, with, spurious, data, originating, from, contamination])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, sometimes, errors, and, inaccuracy, can, turn, 'beneficial,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([insect, and, arthropod, pests, when, analysing, plant, transcriptomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, a, large, number, of, soluble, olfactory, 'proteins,', in, chemical, communication, in, 'insects,', but, absent, in, plants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', work]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, genes, found, in, plants, and, recognised, as, contaminants, can, be, turned, into, useful, information, to, investigate, 'plant-insect', relationships, or, to, identify, new, sequences, from, insects, species, not, yet, investigated])]). selectively]), verbo([induces]), complemento([hepatic, 'autophagy,', which, helps, improve, hepatocellular, integrity, and, metabolic, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', genetic, determinants, strongly, influence, 'HDL', cholesterol, '(', 'HDLc)', 'levels,', most, genetic]), verbo([causes]), complemento([underlying, variation, in, 'HDLc', remain, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, genes, glucokinase, regulatory, protein, '(', 'GCKR),', 'RNase', 'L', '(', 'RNASEL),', leukocyte, 'immunoglobulin-like', receptor, 3, '(', 'LILRA3),', and, work, is, needed, to, unveil, how, various, routes, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([and, integrated, to, maintain, proper, cholesterol, distribution, and, homeostasis, in, eukaryotic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Plasma', total, cholesterol, '(', 'TC)', in, 'HCD', group, was, 327.4, ±, 31.8, 'mg/dL,', while, plasma, 'TC', in, two, 'WBO', and, two, 'RBO', groups, was, 242.2, ±, relacion([sujeto(['GH', mRNA, was, not, detected, in, dwarf, 'mice,', reduced, to, 1.3, '%', in, 'lit/lit', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.005, ')', ',', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([to, 242, '%', in, 'mice,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([to, 200, '%', in, 'GHRH-excess', mice, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Prop-1', was, not, present, in, dwarf, 'mice,', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([to, 1.4, '%', in, 'lit/lit', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', and, increased, to, 223, '%', in, 'GHRH-excess', mice, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altered', pituitary, mRNA, abundance, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([for, several, products, not, previously, 'measured,', or, thought, not, to, be, affected, by, these, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, 'mechanism(s)', underlying, its]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([expression, and, its, function, in, endothelial, cells, remain, unknown])]). human, cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'siRNA-induced', knockdown, of, 'MEF2C', abolished, the, stimulative, effect, of, 'VEGF', on, 'PRL-3', transcript, in, 'HUVEC,', indicating, that, the, a, different, kinetic, of, induction])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, clearly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([an, elevated, susceptibility, to, neurodegeneration, in, 'NPC1-/-', mice, due, to, clinical, benefit])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, showed, that, overall, 'Sph']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, ability, to, cause, a, shift, in, vesicle, surface, 'charge,', increase, their, mechanisms, of, action])]). relacion([sujeto(['Export', of, 'LDL-derived', cholesterol, from, lysosomes]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, cooperation, of, the, integral, membrane, deficiency, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, free, cholesterol, in, 'HSCs,', increasing, 'Col1a1', and, 'α-SMA', expression, and, activating, 'Smad2,', and, leading, to, sensitization, of, 'HSCs', to, 'TGF-β1', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', overexpression, of, 'NPC2']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['U18666A-induced', free, cholesterol, accumulation, and, inhibited, the, subsequent, 'HSCs', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'NPC2', plays, an, important, role, in, 'HSCs', activation, by, regulating, the, accumulation, of, free, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, investigated, the, role, and, mechanism, of, 'Niemann-Pick', type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)2', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([lysosomal, 'activity,', 'mitophagy,', and, mitochondrial, function, in, adipocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), relacion([sujeto(['Lecithin:cholesterol', acyltransferase, '(', 'LCAT)', plays, a, key, role, in, reverse, cholesterol, transport, by, transferring, an, acyl, group, from, phosphatidylcholine, to, verbo([activated]), complemento([through, an, unknown, mechanism, by, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', '(', 'apoA-I)', and, other, mimetic, peptides, that, form, a, belt, around, 'HDL'])]). inactive, conformation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Functional', studies, of, 'site-directed', mutants, revealed, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, latch, interactions, or, the, entire, lid, enhanced, activity, against, soluble, ester, 'substrates,', and, 'hydrogen-deuterium', exchange, '(', 'HDX)', mass, spectrometry, revealed, that, the, 'LCAT', lid, is, extremely, dynamic, in, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review, reflects, on, our, current, understanding, of, the, complex, networking, that, occurs, between, the, virus, and, host, at, the, interface, of, 0.02, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento(['LARGE', as, the, first, known, modifier, of, plasma, 'antithrombin,', and, proposes, a, new, role, for, 'LARGE', in, that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, anomeric, linkage, of, a, sugar, catalyzes, the, reaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Xyloside', 'α-1,3-xylosyltransferase', '(', 'XXYLT1)', is, a]), verbo([retaining]), complemento(['GT', that, regulates, 'Notch', receptor, activation, by, adding, xylose, to, the, 'Notch', extracellular, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', using, natural, acceptor, and, donor, substrates, and, active, 'Mus', musculus, 'XXYLT1,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, series, of, crystallographic, snapshots, along, the, 'reaction,', including, an, unprecedented, natural, and, competent, 'Michaelis', reaction, complex, for, retaining, enzymes])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', structures, strongly, support, the, 'SNi-like', reaction, as, the]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([mechanism, for, 'XXYLT1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', the, epidermal, growth, 'factor-like', repeat, acceptor, substrate, undergoes, a, large, understanding, of, this]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([enzyme, will, accelerate, the, design, of, retaining, 'GT', inhibitors, that, can, modulate, 'Notch', activity, in, pathological, complemento([of, gross, motor, development, together, with, joint, 'and/or', spinal, rigidity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', main, 'CMD', 'subtypes,', grouped, by]), verbo([involved]), complemento([protein, function, and, gene, in, which, causative, allelic, variants, 'occur,', are, laminin, 'alpha-2', '(', 'merosin)', deficiency, '(', 'MDC1A),', collagen, 'VI-deficient', 'CMD,', polypeptide, 'N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase-like', protein, 5, '(', 'GALNTL5),', belongs, to, the, polypeptide, 'N-acetylgalactosamine-transferase', '(', 'pp-GalNAc-T)', gene, family, because, of, its]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([glycosyltransferase, 'domains,', but, it, uniquely, truncates, the, 'C-terminal', domain, and, is, expressed, exclusively, in, human, testis])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', glycosyltransferase, activity, of, the, human, 'GALNTL5', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, identified, by, in, vitro, assay, thus, far])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', mouse, 'Galntl5', 'ortholog,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, whether, 'GALNTL5', is, a, functional, molecule, in, spermatogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', attempted, to, establish, 'Galntl5-deficient', mutant, mice, to, investigate, the, role, of, 'Galntl5', in, spermiogenesis, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, heterozygous, mutation, affected, male, fertility, due, to, immotile, 'sperm,', which, is, diagnosed, as, 'asthenozoospermia,', an, infertility, syndrome, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, heterozygous, mutation, of, 'Galntl5', attenuated, glycolytic, enzymes]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'motility,', disrupted, protein, loading, into, 'acrosomes,', and, caused, aberrant, localization, of, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', system])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', comparing, the, protein, compositions, of, sperm, from, infertile, 'males,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, deletion, mutation, of, the, exon, of, human, 'GALNTL5', gene, in, a, patient, with, asthenozoospermia])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', strongly]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, genetic, mutation, of, human, 'GALNTL5', results, in, male, infertility, with, the, reduction, of, sperm, motility, and, that, 'GALNTL5', is, a, functional, molecule, essential, for, mammalian, sperm, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['H3', poxvirus, protein, is, a, major, target, of, the, human, antibody, response, against, poxviruses, and, is, likely, a, key, contributor, to, protection, against, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['Like', 'glycosyltransferases,', 'H3']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['UDP-glucose,', as, shown, by, saturation, transfer, difference, '(', 'STD)', nuclear, magnetic, resonance, '(', 'NMR)', 'spectroscopy,', and, this, binding, requires, 'Mg(2+)', 'Mutation', of, the, 'glycosyltransferase-like', metal, ion, binding, motif, in, 'H3', greatly, diminished, its, binding, to, 'UDP-glucose'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([by, flow, cytometry, that, 'H3', binds, to, the, surface, of, human, cells, but, does, not, bind, well, to, cells, that, are, deficient, in, surface, glycosaminoglycans])]). relacion([sujeto(['STD', 'NMR', experiments, using, a, heparin, sulfate, decasaccharide, confirmed, that, 'H3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([heparin, sulfate])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, a, surface, of, 'H3', with, an, excess, positive, charge, may, be, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, heparin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Heparin']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, glycosyltransferase, activity, may, be, involved, in, the, function, of, 'H3', in, the, poxvirus, life, cycle])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', smallpox, vaccine, using, vaccinia, virus]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, highly, 'successful,', but, it, is, still, unclear, why, the, vaccine, is, so, effective])]). relacion([sujeto(['Studying', the, antigens, that, the, immune, system]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([may, allow, a, better, understanding, of, how, the, vaccine, elicits, immunity, and, how, improved, vaccines, can, be, developed])]). relacion([sujeto(['Poxvirus', protein, 'H3', is, a, major]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, the, immune, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'H3', crystal, structure, shows, that, it]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, glycosyltransferase, protein, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'H3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, sugar, nucleotide, 'UDP-glucose,', as, do, glycosyltransferases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', experiments, also]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'H3', binds, cell, surface, molecules, that, are, involved, in, the, attachment, of, poxviruses, to, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', the, function, of, an, 'UFGT', gene]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, biosynthesis, of, anthocyanin, was, verified, through, heterologous, expression, and, 'virus-induced', gene, silencing, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, the, formation, of, anthocyanin])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, pericarp, with, 'LcUFGT1']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, 'virus-induced', gene, 'silencing,', pigmentation, was, 'retarded,', which, was, well, correlated, with, the, 'reduced-LcUFGT1', transcriptional, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, 'glycosylation-related', gene, 'LcUFGT1', plays, a, critical, role, in, red, color, formation, in, the, pericarp, of, litchi])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([comparative, biochemical, and, kinetic, studies, using, recombinant, 'OtsA,', 'VldE,', and, their, chimeric, proteins, with, 'a\240\variety', of, sugar, and, pseudosugar, substrates])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, chimeric, enzymes, can, produce, hybrid, 'pseudo-(amino)disaccharides,', and, an, amino, group, in, the, acceptor, is, necessary, to, facilitate, a, coupling, reaction, with, a, pseudosugar, donor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'N-terminal', domains, of, the, enzymes, not, only, play, a, major, role, in, selecting, the, 'acceptors,', but, also, control, the, type, of, nucleotidyl, diphosphate, moiety, of, the, donors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bifunctional, attractive, drug, targets, for, the, treatment, of, diabetes, and, cardiovascular, disease, due, to, their, established, role, as, regulators, of, cholesterol, and, lipid, metabolism])]). profound, roles, in, fetal, programming, and, adult, regulation, of, glucolipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, on, the, involving, disrupted, glucose, and, lipid, homeostasis, in, human, and, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', intracellular, concentration, of, the, mitogen, phosphatidic, acid, '(', 'PA)', must, be]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, low, levels, until, the, need, arises, for, cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['How', temporal, and, spatial, trafficking, of, 'PA', affects, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, in, the, different, cellular, compartments, is, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, cancer, 'cells,', 'PA', cycles, back, and, forth, from, the, cellular, membrane, to, the, 'nucleus,', affecting, the, function, of, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF),', in, a, process, that, involves, 'PPARα/LXRα', in, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', 'PA']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['EGFR', 'expression,', a, role, compatible, with, the, mitogenic, ability, of, the, 'PA', levels, inside, the, nucleus, reach, a, certain, threshold, '(', &, 'gt;100', 'nM)', 'PA', outcompetes, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, and, transcription, is, inhibited])]). mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Apart', from, the, well, known, systemic, 'RAS,', occurrence, of, a, local, 'RAS']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, documented, in, multiple, 'tissues,', complemento([of, hepatocyte, dedifferentiation, during, culture, and, address, means, to, develop, approaches, to, 'prevent/limit', phenotype, change])]). relacion([sujeto(['AMP-activated', protein, verbo([has]), complemento([long, been, documented, that, 'AMPK', activation, suppresses, hepatic, 'SREBP-1', mRNA, and, nuclear, 'SREBP-1', protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'AMPK', is, robustly, activated, in, rat, hepatoma, 'McA-RH7777', cells, treated, with, two, widely, used, 'AMPK', 'activators,', 'AICAR', and, 'metformin,', and, 'AMPK', 'gt;', 'E3FAD-CX,', whereas, levels, of, 'lipoprotein-associated/lipidated', apoE]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, opposite, pattern, '(', 6, 'months)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'E4FAD-HP,', 'short-term', 'RXR', agonist, treatment, '(', 'Bex', or, 'LG100268;', 5.75, -, 6, 'months)']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['ABCA1,', apoE4, 'lipoprotein-association/lipidation,', and, 'apoE4/Aβ', 'complex,', decreased, soluble, 'Aβ,', and, increased, 'PSD95'])]). relacion([sujeto(['RXR', agonists]), verbo([induced]), complemento([no, beneficial, effects, in, the, 'E4FAD-HP', in, a, prevention, protocol, '(', 5, -, 6, 'months)', and, actually, increased, soluble, 'Aβ', levels, in, 'E3FAD-CX', and, 'E4FAD-CX', with, the, 'short-term', 'protocol,', possibly, the, result, of, systemic, hepatomegaly])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'RXR', agonists, address, the, 'loss-of-function']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'APOE4', and, exacerbated, by, 'Aβ', 'pathology,', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXR)', are, deemed, as, potential, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'atherosclerosis,', whereas, a, role, in, adipose, tissue, expansion, and, its, relation, to, insulin, sensitivity, remains, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increased', adipocyte, apoptosis, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, epididymal, fat, of, 'T0901317-treated', 'HFD', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'T0901317', treatment]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([basal, 'lipolysis,', but, blunted, the, 'anti-lipolytic', action, of, administration])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', these, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'LXR', activation, impairs, adipose, expansion, by, increasing, adipocyte, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, complexity, far, greater, than, was, previously, thought])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Glucocorticoid', 'Receptor', '(', 'GR)', is, a, transcription, factor, effects, of, 'GC', are, still, largely, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['DeltaGR', is, a, constitutively, transcriptionally, active, form, of, the, 'GR', that, is, localized, in, the, nuclei, and]), verbo([activates]), complemento([transcription, without, binding, to, glucocorticoids])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', focused, our, study, on, a, mouse, line, that]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['DeltaGR', almost, selectively, in, the, glutamatergic, neurons, of, the, dentate, gyrus, '(', 'DG)', of, the, hippocampus])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', restricted, expression, of, the, 'DeltaGR']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['anxiety-related', behaviors, without, affecting, other, behaviors, that, could, indirectly, influence, performance, in, 'anxiety-related', tests])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', behavioral, phenotype, was, also]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, an, 'up-regulation', of, the, 'MAPK', signaling, pathway, and, 'Egr-1', protein, in, the, 'DG'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Endogenous', 'IP(3)Rs']), verbo([provide]), complemento([very, appealing, tools, for, studying, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, in, intact, mammalian, cells, 'because,', upon, 'activation,', they, are, rapidly, ubiquitinated, and, degraded])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', mass, 'spectrometry,', we, previously, examined, the, ubiquitination, of, 'IP(3)R1', in, 'αT3-1', pituitary, gonadotrophs, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'IP(3)R1', ubiquitination, is, highly, 'complex,', with, receptors, being, modified, at, multiple, sites, by, monoubiquitin, and, polyubiquitin, chains, formed, through, both, 'Lys-48', and, 'Lys-63', linkages, '(', 'Sliter,', 'D'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([extended, these, studies, to, determine, whether, 'IP(3)R2', and, 'IP(3)R3', are, similarly, modified, and, if, ubiquitination, is, cell, 'type-dependent'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', mass, spectrometry, and, 'linkage-specific', ubiquitin, 'antibodies,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, all, 'IP(3)R', types, are, subject, to, ubiquitination, at, approximately, the, same, locations, and, 'that,', independent, of, cell, 'type,', 'IP(3)Rs', are, modified, by, monoubiquitin, and, 'Lys-48-', and, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, 'chains,', although, in, differing, proportions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,', the, attached, 'Lys-48-', and, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, chains, are, homogeneous, and, are, segregated, to, separate, 'IP(3)R', 'subunits,', and, 'Lys-48-linked', ubiquitin, 'chains,', but, not, 'Lys-63-linked', 'chains,', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'IP(3)R', degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([unique, insight, into, the, complexities, of, ubiquitination, of, an, endogenous, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, substrate, in, unperturbed, mammalian, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', although, 'Lys-48-linked', ubiquitin, chains, appear, to]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([proteasomal, 'degradation,', the, presence, of, 'Lys-63-linked', ubiquitin, chains, suggests, that, ubiquitination, of, 'IP(3)Rs', may, have, physiological, consequences, beyond, signaling, for, degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', receptors, are, a, large, structural, class, of, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([act]), complemento([with, their, 'co-regulators', and, repressors, to, maintain, a, variety, of, biological, and, physiological, processes, such, as, 'metabolism,', development, and, reproduction])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([through, the, binding, of, small, 'ligands,', which, can, be, replaced, by, drug, 'molecules,', making, nuclear, receptors, promising, drug, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transcriptional', regulation, of, the, genes, that, encode, them, is, central, to]), verbo([gained]), complemento([a, deeper, understanding, of, the, diversity, of, their, biochemical, and, biophysical, roles, and, their, role, in, disease, and, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Even', though, they, share, evolutionary, 'history,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, genes, have, fundamentally, different, expression, 'patterns,', ranging, from, ubiquitously, expressed, to, 'tissue-specific', and, spatiotemporally, complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', current, understanding, of, regulation, in]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, gene, family, is, still, nascent])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, investigate, the, relationship, between, 'long-range', regulation, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, family, and, their, known, functionality])]). relacion([sujeto(['Towards', this, 'goal,', we, identify, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, genes, that, are, potential, targets, based, on, counts, of, highly, complemento([protein, 1, 'A', '(', 'DDB1A),', 'DDB2,', and, 'UV', hypersensitive, 6, '(', 'UVH6)/XPD', are, all, involved, in, the, repair, of, 'UV-damaged', 'DNA', -, 'DDB1A', and, 'DDB2', in, the, a, reduction, in, autophagic, vacuole, degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', autophagy, induction, minimized, cellular, lipid, accumulation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 7, -, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', direct, relationship, between, obesity, and, breast, cancer]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, elucidated, recently, with, the, identification, of, a, cholesterol, derivative, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 27, 'HC),', an, endogenous, 'SERM', that, can, act, through, estrogen, receptor, '(', 'ER)-mediated', mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', verbo([have]), complemento([used, a, yeast, genetic, system, to, isolate, cDNAs, encoding, proteins, that, specifically, interact, with, the, 'ligand-binding', domain, of, human, retinoid, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', '(', 'RXR', 'alpha)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', number, encoded, portions, of, two, known, 'RXR', heterodimer, 'partners,', the, retinoic, acid, receptor, '(', 'RAR)', and, the, peroxisome, proliferator]), verbo([activated]), complemento([receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Of', four, additional, 'RXR-interacting', proteins, '(', 'RIPs)', selected, for, further, study, 'two,', 'RIP14', and, 'RIP15,', are, previously, unidentified, orphan, members, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', 'others,', 'RIP110', and, 'RIP13,', do, not, show, significant, similarities, to, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['RIP110']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'LexA-RXR', the, presence, or, absence, of, 9, -, 'cis-RA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['RIP110', and, 'RIP13', also]), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, yeast, with, several, other, members, of, the, receptor, 'superfamily,', but, 'RIP14', and, 'RIP15', interact, only, with, 'RXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Northern', blot, analysis, indicates, that, 'RIP14', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([specifically, in, liver, and, 'kidney,', while, 'RIP15', is, expressed, in, every, tissue, tested])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'RIP14', and, 15]), verbo([bind]), complemento([as, 'neurogenesis-dependent', and, -, independent, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LXRβ', activation, may, represent, a, potential, novel, tolerance, to, pyolysin, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, inhibitors, that, target, the, mevalonate, and, cholesterol, synthesis, 'pathway,', but, not, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase,', cell, 'cycle,', or, metabolic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cellular', cholesterol, was, reduced, and, cell, tolerance, to, pyolysin, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, supplying, the, 'mevalonate-derived', isoprenoid, farnesyl, 'pyrophosphate,', or, by, inhibiting, 'farnesyl-diphosphate', farnesyltransferase, 1, or, geranylgeranyl, diphosphate, synthase, 1, to, increase, the, abundance, of, farnesyl, pyrophosphate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Supplying', the, 'mevalonate-derived', isoprenoid, geranylgeranyl, pyrophosphate, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cell, tolerance, to, 'pyolysin,', but, independent, of, changes, in, cellular, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', geranylgeranyl, pyrophosphate]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([nuclear, receptor, subfamily, 1, group, 'H', receptors, '(', 'NR1H,', also, known, as, 'Liver', 'X', 'receptors),', and, reducing, the, expression, of, the, genes, encoding, 'NR1H3', or, 'NR1H2', increased, stromal, cell, tolerance, to, pyolysin])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'mevalonate-derived', isoprenoids]), verbo([increased]), complemento([bovine, endometrial, stromal, cell, tolerance, to, 'pyolysin,', which, was, associated, with, reducing, cellular, cholesterol, and, inhibiting, 'NR1H', receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tc9', cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([different, levels, of, cholesterol, synthesis, and, efflux, genes, and, possessed, significantly, lower, cholesterol, content, than, 'Tc1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanistic', receptors, '(', 'LXRs;', 'α/β)', are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, known, to, regulate, cholesterol, homeostasis, and, the, production, of, select, hematopoietic, populations])]). animals, are, protected, from]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, salivary, flow])]). relacion([sujeto(['Stress,', 'injury,', and, disease]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([glucocorticoid, '(', 'GC)', elevation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Elevated', 'GCs']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, ubiquitously, expressed, glucocorticoid, receptor, '(', 'GR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', 'GRs', are, in, every, cell, in, the, nervous, 'system,', the, expression, level, 'varies,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, diverse, cell, types, react, differently, to, 'GR', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Stress/GCs']), verbo([induce]), complemento([structural, plasticity, in, 'neurons,', 'Schwann', 'cells,', 'microglia,', 'oligodendrocytes,', and, astrocytes, as, well, as, affect, neurotransmission, by, changing, the, release, and, reuptake, of, glutamate])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, brief, 'review,', we, describe, the, evidence, that, 'stress/GCs']), verbo([activate]), complemento(['GR', to, promote, cell, 'type-specific', changes, in, cellular, plasticity, throughout, the, nervous, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', pleiotropic, glucocorticoid, actions, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, ubiquitously, expressed, transcription, 'factor,', the, human, glucocorticoid, receptor, '(', 'hGR),', which, may, influence, the, transcription, rate, of, numerous, target, 'genes,', interact, with, other, transcription, 'factors,', trigger, the, activation, of, several, kinase, pathways, or, modulate, mitochondrial, 'DNA', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Any', genetic, defects, in, the, 'NR3C1gene', that, encodes, the, hGR, may]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['Primary', 'Generalized', 'Glucocorticoid', 'Resistance', or, 'Hypersensitivity', 'Syndromes,', two, rare, allostatic, endocrinologic, conditions, characterized, by, partial, impaired, tissue, sensitivity, to, glucocorticoids])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', there, are, patients, who, present, with, clinical, manifestations, suggestive, of, the, above, syndromes, and, do, not, harbor, an]), verbo([inactivating]), complemento([or, activating, point, 'mutation,', insertion, or, deletion, in, the, 'NR3C1gene'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we, speculate, that, the, next, generation, sequencing, technologies, will, undoubtedly, enable, us, to]), verbo([gain]), complemento([a, deeper, understanding, of, the, 'GR', '"', 'interactome"'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Programmed', 'death-1', receptor, '(', 'PD-1)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, relacion([sujeto(['In', vivo, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, 'that,', of, the, three, 'MTG', 'corepressors,', 'MTG16', is, uniquely, important, for, the, regulation, of, hematopoietic, complemento([in, carcinomas, and, 'leukemias,', acting, as, the, genetic, target, of, loss, of, heterozygosity, '(', 'LOH)', aberrations, in, breast, cancer, and, recurrent, translocations, in, leukemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', mounting, evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'MTG16', indirectly, alters, the, disease, course, of, several, leukemias, via, its, regulatory, interactions, with, a, variety, of, pathologic, fusion, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', 'example,', a, recent, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, 'MTG16', can, therapeutic, target, in, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia, expressing, the, 'E2A-Pbx1', fusion, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', that, leukemia, stem, cells, share, similar, regulatory, pathways, for, leukemia, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', exploring, this, critical, 'phenomenon,', trophoblastic, cell, lines, can]), verbo([provide]), complemento([substantial, information])]). 'BMP4-treated', groups])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', 12, cell, lines, were]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([for, around, 30, 'passages,', and, they, retained, trophoblastic, characteristics, to, drive, expression, of, target, genes, in, intestinal, tissues, after, hatching])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', new, transgene, expression, 'system,', using, the, 'MUC2', 'promoter,', will]), promoter, via, nuclear, factor, kappa, 'B', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', and, stimulate, production, of, 'Cdx2', protein, in, oesophageal, keratinocytes, with, a, resulting, production, of, intestinal, type, relacion([sujeto(['The', prevailing, view, of, coregulator, action, holds, that, in, the, absence, of, agonist, the, receptor]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, a, corepressor, via, the, corepressor, nuclear, receptor, '(', 'CoRNR,', '"', 'corner")', box, motifs, within, the, corepressor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Upon', agonist, 'binding,', a, conformational, change, in, the, receptor]), verbo([causes]), complemento([the, shedding, of, corepressor, and, the, binding, of, a, coactivator, which, interacts, with, the, receptor, via, 'NR', boxes, within, the, coregulator])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', view, was, challenged, with, the, discovery, of, 'RIP140', which]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, 'NR', corepressor, in, the, presence, of, agonist, and, utilizes, 'NR', 'BEAS-2B', epithelial, 'cells,', accompanied, by, activation, of, nuclear, 'factor-κappaB', pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Incubation', with, 'CU-CPT22,', a, specific, toll, like, receptor, 2, 'antagonist,', significantly, reduced, the, 'Staphylococcus', 'aureus-induced']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, thymic, stromal, 'lymphopoietin,', 'interleukin-33', and, the, activity, of, the, nuclear, 'factor-κappa', 'B', signal, in, 'BEAS-2B', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([has]), complemento([for, the, first, time, demonstrated, that, 'Staphylococcus', aureus, can, directly, induce, epithelial, 'cell-derived', cytokine, release, via, binding, to, toll, like, receptor, 2, ',', and, may, thereby, propagate, type, 2, cytokine, expression, in, nasal, polyp, tissue])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', tripartite, motif, protein, 38, '(', 'TRIM38),', a, member, of, the, 'TRIM', 'family,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, various, cellular, processes, such, as, cell, 'proliferation,', 'differentiation,', 'apoptosis,', and, antiviral, defense])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, involvement, of, 'TRIM38', in, osteoclast, and, osteoblast, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'TRIM38,', in, osteoclast, precursor, 'cells,', attenuated, receptor, activator, of]), 'genes,', such, as, 'NFATc1,', 'osteoclast-associated', receptor, '(', 'OSCAR),', and, 'tartrate-resistant', acid, phosphatase, '(', 'TRAP);', and, 'down-regulation', of, 'TRIM38', expression, showed, the, opposite, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, of, 'TRIM38', in, osteoblast, precursors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([increased, osteoblast, differentiation, and, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['TRIM38', also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([degradation, of, 'lysosome-dependent', transforming, growth, factor, 'beta-activated', kinase, 1, and, 'Tetrachlorodibenzo-p-dioxin', '(', 'TCDD)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([hepatic, oxidative, stress, following, activation, of, the, aryl, hydrocarbon, receptor, '(', 'AhR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', recent, studies, showed, 'TCDD']), verbo([induced]), complemento([pyruvate, kinase, muscle, isoform, 2, '(', 'Pkm2)', as, a, novel, antioxidant, response, in, normal, metabolites, of, vitamin, 'D3', '(', 'VD3)']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, different, cytochrome, 'P450', '(', 'CYP)', 'enzymes,', play, fundamental, roles, in, many, physiological, processes, current, '(', 'ICa)', in, an, 'isomer-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, both, 'L-type', and, 'non-L-type', 'voltage-gated', 'Ca2+', receptor, activation, by, 'at-RA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, estimated, that, '~1%', of, the, 'world\'s', population]), verbo([has]), complemento([intellectual, 'disability,', with, males, affected, more, often, than, females])]). relacion([sujeto(['Three', missense, mutations, in, the, tetratricopeptide, '(', 'TPR)', repeats, of, 'OGT']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, reported, to, cause, 'X-linked', 'Intellectual', 'Disability', '(', 'XLID)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, discovery, of, two, additional, novel, missense, mutations, '(', c])]). relacion([sujeto(['\240\', 'However,', analyses, of, the, differential, transcriptomes, of, the, 'OGT', variant]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([stem, cells, revealed, shared, deregulation, of, genes, involved, in, cell, fate, determination, and, 'LXR/RXR', 'signaling,', which, has, been, implicated, in, neuronal, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', here, we]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([2, additional, mutations, encoding, residues, in, the, 'TPR', regions, of, 'OGT', that, appear, causal, for, 'XLID', and, provide, evidence, that, the, relatively, stable, and, active, 'TPR', variants, may, share, a, 'common,', 'unelucidated,', mechanism, of, altering, gene, expression, profiles, in, human, embryonic, stem, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Amphibian', metamorphosis, is, initiated, and, sustained, through, the, action, of, 'TH', on, 'TRs', which, are]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([across, vertebrates])]). relacion([sujeto(['TRs']), verbo([heterodimerize]), complemento([with, 'retinoid-X', receptors, '(', 'RXRs)', on, thyroid, 'hormone-response', elements, '(', 'TREs)', in, the, 'genome,', yet, in, most, cell, line, and, adult, animal, 'studies,', 'RXR', ligands, do, not, affect, expression, of, 'TR', target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, proteases, 'acyl-coenzyme', aoxidase, 1, '(', 'ACOX1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dual', luciferase, assays, indicated, that, p38α, 'MAPK']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, transcription, of, 'PPARα,', 'PGC-1α', and, 'CYP7A1', by, upregulating, their, 'promoters\'', activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', in, vitro, and, in, vivo, assays, indicated, p38α, 'MAPK', negatively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, hepatic, steatosis, by, controlling, 'JNK', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conculsion,', our, findings, demonstrate, that, hepatic, p38α, 'MAPK', functions, as, a, negative, regulator, of, liver, steatosis, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento(['BA', synthesis, and, 'FAO', by, antagonizing, the, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['MAF', bZIP, transcription, factor, 'G', '(', 'MAFG)', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', to, repress, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', expression, of, 'MAFG']), verbo([increases]), complemento([during, cholestatic, liver, injury, in, mice, and, in, cholangiocarcinomas])]). relacion([sujeto(['MAFG']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, with, methionine, adenosyltransferase, 1, 'A', '(', 'MAT1A)', and, other, transcription, factors, at, the, 'E-box', element, to, repress, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', studied, mechanisms, of, 'MAFG', upregulation, in, cholestatic, tissues, and, the, pathways, by, which, 'S-adenosylmethionine', '(', 'SAMe)', and, increased, expression, of, 'MAFG'])]). relacion([sujeto(['OCA']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'MAFG,', 'MAT2A,', and, 'c-MYC', but, reduced, expression, of, 'MAT1A'])]). involved, in, bile, 'acids,', glucose, and, lipid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', its, role, as, guardian, of, 'metabolism,', 'FXR']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, a, promising, pharmacological, target, in, liver, bile, acid, and, lipid, 'accumulation,', such, as, cholestasis, and, 'non-alcoholic', fatty, liver, disease, '(', 'NAFLD)'])]). 'alterations;', 'however,', the, mechanism, of, membrane, sensitivity, of, the, bile, 'acid-sensitive', ion, channel, is, not, known])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, not, been, systematically, investigated, whether, other, members, of, the, 'degenerin/epithelial', 'Na+', channel, '(', 'DEG/ENaC)', gene, family, are, affected, by, amphiphilic, compounds])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'DEG/ENaCs', 'ASIC1a,', 'ASIC3,', 'ENaC,', and, the, purinergic, receptor, 'P2X2', are]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, a, large, number, of, 'region,', demonstrating, that, they, perturbed, the, membrane, structure])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', our, results, show, that, 'DEG/ENaCs', and, structurally, related, 'P2X', receptors, are]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, diverse, amphiphilic, molecules])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', they]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([alterations, of, membrane, properties, by, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, are]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([in, the, liver, and, maintained, in, an, enterohepatic, circulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', liver, is, also, the, main, storage, site, for, vitamin, 'A', in, the, mammalian, 'body,', where, an, intimate, collaboration, between, hepatocytes, and, hepatic, stellate, cells]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, accumulation, of, retinyl, esters, in, large, cytoplasmic, lipid, droplet, hepatic, stellate, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chronic', liver, diseases, are, often, characterized, by, disturbed, bile, acid, and, vitamin, 'A', 'homeostasis,', where, bile, production, is, impaired, and, hepatic, stellate, cells, lose, their, vitamin, 'A', in, a, transdifferentiation, process, to, 'myofibroblasts,', cells, that, produce, excessive, extracellular, matrix, proteins]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, fibrosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chronic', liver, diseases, thus, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, vitamin, 'A', deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([an, intricate, crosstalk, between, vitamin, 'A', metabolites, and, bile, 'acids,', in, part, via, the, 'Retinoic', 'Acid', 'Receptor', '(', 'RAR),', 'Retinoid', 'X', 'Receptor', '(', 'RXR)', and, the, 'Farnesoid', 'X', 'Receptor', '(', 'FXR),', in, maintaining, vitamin, 'A', and, bile, acid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, of, the, various, levels, of, '"', 'communication"', between, vitamin, 'A', metabolites, and, bile, acids, and, its, relevance, for, the, treatment, of, chronic, liver, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, are, end, products, of, cholesterol, metabolism, generated, in, the, liver, and]), verbo([released]), complemento([in, the, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, their, role, in, nutrient, 'absorption,', bile, acids, are, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, regulatory, signals, that, exert, their, function, beyond, the, intestine, by, activating, a, network, of, membrane, and, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', best, characterized, of, these, bile, 'acid-activated', 'receptors,', 'GPBAR1', '(', also, known, as, 'TGR5)', and, the, 'farnesosid-X-receptor', '(', 'FXR),']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, detected, in, the, vascular, system, and, their, activation, mediates, the, vasodilatory, effects, of, bile, acids, in, the, systemic, and, splanchnic, circulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['GPBAR1,', is, a, 'G', 'protein-coupled', 'receptor,', that, is, preferentially]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, lithocholic, acid, '(', 'LCA)', a, secondary, bile, acid])]). relacion([sujeto(['GPBAR1', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, endothelial, cells, and, liver, sinusoidal, cells, '(', 'LSECs)', and, responds, to, 'LCA', by, regulating, the, expression, of, both, endothelial, nitric, oxide, synthase, '(', 'eNOS)', and, 'cystathionine-γ-lyase', '(', 'CSE),', an, enzyme, involved, in, generation, of, hydrogen, sulfide, '(', 'H2S)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, 'CSE', by, 'GPBAR1', ligands, in, 'LSECs', is, due, to, genomic, and, nongenomic, 'effects,']), verbo([involves]), complemento([protein, 'phosphorylation,', and, leads, to, release, of, 'H2S'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', that, 'species-specific', effects]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'described,', vasodilation, caused, by, 'GPBAR1', ligands, in, the, liver, microcirculation, and, aortic, rings, is, abrogated, by, inhibition, of, 'CSE', but, not, by, eNOS, inhibitor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Vasodilation']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'GPBAR1', '(', and, 'FXR)', ligands, also, involves, large, conductance, 'calcium-activated', potassium, channels, likely, acting, downstream, to, 'H2S'])]). relacion([sujeto(['OCT1']), verbo([has]), complemento([unique, expression, pattern])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, highest, expression, among, drug, transporters, in, normal, human, hepatocytes, with, large, interindividual, 'variability,', but, it, has, negligible, expression, in, other, tissues, or, their, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nowadays,', it, is, clear, that, the, regulation, of, 'SLC22A1', gene, encoding, 'OCT1', transporter, is, rather, complex, and, that, transactivation, with, hepatocyte]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 4, α, '(', 'HNF4α)', and, 'CCAAT-enhancer-binding', propose, that, comprehensive, understanding, of, mechanisms, of, 'SLC22A1', gene, regulation, could, direct, research, for, other, drug, transporters, and, 'drug-metabolizing', enzymes, highly]), biliary, cirrhosis, '(', 'PBC)', and, primary, sclerosing, cholangitis, '(', 'PSC)', patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, recently, proposed])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', major, insight]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, gained, into, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', physiology, during, the, last, decade, including, the, role, of, 'BAs', as, metabolic, modulators, and, the, 'gut-liver', axis])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', a, 'consequence,', alongside, drugs]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([immune, response, or, fibrotic, 'processes,', a, number, of, novel, 'anti-cholestatic', agents, have, undergone, 'pre-clinical', and, clinical, evaluation, and, have, shown, promising, results, although, none, has, been, approved, yet])]). relacion([sujeto(['Novel', therapeutic, approaches, include, '(', 'i)', agonists, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptors,', especially, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR),', glucocorticoid, receptor, '(', 'GR)', and, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, α, '(', 'PPARα)', that, are, transcriptional, modifiers, of, bile, 'formation;', '(', 'ii)', agonists, of, 'TGR5,', a, 'BA', membrane, receptor, expressed, in, various, 'tissues;', '(', 'iii)', inhibitors, of, the, ileal, apical, sodium, 'BA', 'transporter;', '(', 'iv)', derivatives, of, the, 'FXR-induced', fibroblast, growth, factor, 19, from, the, ileum, that, suppresses, hepatic, 'BA', synthesis, and, '(', 'v)', 'norUDCA,', a, side, chain, shortened, 'UDCA', derivative, with, specific, relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'As-pro-PO', 'V', by, dsRNA, resulted, in, significant]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([in, the, degree, of, microfilaria, 'melanization,', egg, chronic,
