verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, both, 'AP-1,', a, putative, 'immune-related', regulatory, element, and, 'CdxA,', a, developmental, regulatory, element])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'AP-1', and, 'CdxA', motif, with, mosquito, nuclear, extracts, was, significantly, enhanced, after, microfilaria, challenge, and, 'blood-feeding', in, 'Ar'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'As-pro-PO', 'V', is, a, critical, enzyme, that, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, both, an, effective, melanization, immune, response, and, egg, chorion, melanization, in, this, mosquito])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', recent, 'genome-wide', association, study, '(', 'GWAS)', had, discovered, a, new, locus, at, 8, p23, '(', 'rs2738048)']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'IgA', nephropathy, '(', 'IgAN)', in, 'Chinese', 'Han', 'patients,', implicating, the, 'DEFA', gene, family, within, this, locus, as, susceptibility, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', it, is, still, unknown, whether, there, are, additional, variations, within, these, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, disease, susceptibility])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([seven, 'SNPs', within, 'DEFA', genes, that, were, significantly, associated, with, 'IgAN,', including, rs2738048, discovered, in, our, previous, 'GWAS', '(', 'p\240\=\240\0'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Electrophoretic', mobility, shift, assays, and, luciferase, assays, demonstrated, that, fragments, containing, 'rs2738048,', rs2738081, and, rs6984215, were, transcription, factor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, 'CTF,', 'SP1', and, 'CdxA,', 'respectively,', and, the, allele, status, of, rs2738048, and, rs6984215, could, significantly, change, the, luciferase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, polymorphisms, within, 'DEFA', genes, are, involved, in, gene, transcriptional, 'regulation,', and, this, may, have, some, effect, in, mediating, susceptibility, to, 'IgAN', in, southern, 'Chinese'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Children', '(', 'n=488;', age, 'range:', 1.8, -, 6.0, 'y)', were, randomly]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([from, 'Montreal'])]). relacion([sujeto([1, ')', were, positively]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'BMC', and, aBMD, in, all, regression, 'models,', whereas, male, sex, contributed, positively, to, forearm, 'BMC', and, aBMD])]). relacion([sujeto(['Having', a, 25, '(', 'OH)D', concentration, of, &, 'gt;75', 'nmol/L', positively]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, forearm, and, whole, body, 'BMC', and, aBMD, '(', 'p<0'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Claudin-6', '(', 'CLDN6)', is, an, integral, component, of, the, tight, junction, proteins, in, polarized, epithelial, and, endothelial, cells, and, plays, a, crucial, role, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cell, integrity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deregulation', of, 'CLDN6', expression, and, distribution, in, tumor, tissues]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, widely, documented, and, correlated, with, cancer, progression, and, metastasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['CLDN6', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, diverse, set, of, transcription, factors, '(', 'SP1,', 'SPR,', 'AML-1a,', 'CdxA,', 'CRE-BP', and, 'CREB)', and, associated, with, the, levels, of, methylation, of, 'CpG', islands, in, promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structural, properties, of, 'CLDN6', indicate, that, it]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cancer, cell, behavior, via, the, 'ASK1-p38/JNK', 'MAPK', secretory, signaling, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto([miRNAs]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, widely, investigated, in, terms, of, cell, proliferation, and, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, characterized, the, promoter, of, 'miR-206', in, chicken, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, preferable, promoter, was, located, in, 1200, bp, upstream, of, 'pri-miR-206'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'region,', many, key, transcription, 'factors,', including, 'MyoD,', 'c-Myb,', 'CEBPα/β,', 'AP-4,', 'RAP1,', 'Brn2,', 'GATA-1/2/3,', 'E47,', 'Sn,', upstream, stimulatory, factor, '(', 'USF)', and, 'CdxA,', were, predicted, to]), muscle, specific, transcriptional, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, motif]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, 'MyoD', was, individually, destroyed, by, 'G-to-C', mutation, located, at, 419, bp, upstream, of, 'miR-206', precursor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', this, mutation]), verbo([caused]), complemento([low, expression, of, 'miR-206'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', the, regulation, of, 'miR-206', on, embryo, muscle, mass, mainly, by]), verbo([increasing]), complemento(['MyoG', and, muscle, creatine, kinase, '(', 'MCK)', expression, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', with, little, change, in, 'MyoD,', 'TMEM8C', and, myosin, heavy, chain, '(', 'MHC)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, novel, mutation, destroying, the, promoter, activity, of, 'miR-206', in, birds, and, shed, new, light, to, understand, the, regulation, mechanism, of, 'miR-206', on, the, embryonic, muscle, growth])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', determine, whether, this]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([activity, is, mediated, through, modulation, of, the, dimerization, process, or, through, interaction, with, 'coactivators,', we, performed, quantitative, 'protein-protein', interaction, assays, with, in, vitro, translated, vitamin, 'D', receptor, '(', 'ivtVDR)', and, fusion, proteins, containing, 'glutathione-S-transferase', '(', 'GST)', and, either, the, 'ligand-binding', domain, of, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'RXRalpha),', or, the, nuclear, 'receptor-interacting', domain, of, the, steroid, receptor, coactivator, 1, '(', 'SRC-1),', or, the, glucocorticoid, 'receptor-interacting', protein, 1, '(', 'GRIP-1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, heterodimerization, of, the, 'ligand-binding', domains, of, 'RXRalpha', and, 'VDR', was, primarily, deltanoid, dependent, as, was, the, interaction, of, 'VDR', with, the, 'SRC-1', or, with, 'GRIP-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, heptad, 9, diminished, both, 1, ',', 25, 'D3', and, the, 20, -, epi, 'analog-mediated', 'dimerization,', without, changing]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, these, ligands, to, 'VDR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'VDR\'s', activation, function, 2, '(', 'AF-2)', 'domain/helix', 12, residues, diminished, the, ability, of, 1, ',', 25, 'D3', to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([heterodimerization, and, interaction, with, 'SRC-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', mutations, did, not, change, the, ability, of, 20, -, 'epi-1,25D3', to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([dimerization, but, did, diminish, its, ability, to, induce, interaction, with, 'SRC-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'TRAP220', and, 'TRAP100', contain, 'LXXLL', domains]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, other, nuclear, 'receptor-interacting', proteins, and, both, appear, to, reside, in, a, single, complex, with, other, 'TRAPs', '(', in, the, absence, of, 'TR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', only, 'TRAP220', shows, a, direct, 'ligand-dependent', interaction, with, 'TRalpha,', and, these, interactions, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, the, 'C', terminus, of, 'TRalpha', and, '(', at, least, in, 'part)', the, 'LXXLL', domains, of, 'TRAP220'])]). relacion([sujeto(['TRAP220', also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, other, nuclear, receptors, '[', vitamin, 'D', 'receptor,', retinoic, acid, receptor, 'alpha,', retinoid, 'X', receptor, 'alpha,', peroxisome, 'proliferation-activated', receptor, '(', 'PPAR)', 'alpha,', 'PPARgamma', 'and,', to, a, lesser, 'extent,', estrogen, 'receptor]', in, a, 'ligand-dependent', 'manner,', whereas, 'TRAP100', shows, only, marginal, interactions, with, estrogen, 'receptor,', retinoid, 'X', receptor, 'alpha,', 'PPARalpha,', and, 'PPARgamma'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'results,', 'TRAP220', moderately]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([human, 'TRalpha-mediated', transcription, in, transfected, 'cells,', whereas, a, fragment, containing, the, 'LXXLL', motifs, acts, as, a, dominant, negative, inhibitor, of, nuclear, 'receptor-mediated', transcription, both, in, transfected, cells, '(', 'TRalpha)', and, in, cell, free, transcription, systems, '(', 'TRalpha', and, vitamin, 'D', 'receptor)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', studies, indicate, that, 'TRAP220', plays, a, major, role, in, anchoring, other, 'TRAPs', to, 'TRalpha', during, the, function, of, the, 'TRalpha-TRAP', complex, 'and,', 'further,', that, 'TRAP220', '(', possibly, along, with, other, 'TRAPs)', may, be, a, global, coactivator, for, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', thyroid, hormone, receptor, '(', 'TR)', and, retinoic, acid, receptor, '(', 'RAR)', isoforms]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, capacity, to, silence, gene, expression, in, the, absence, of, their, ligands, on, target, response, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', active, repression, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, ability, of, the, 'corepressors,', nuclear, receptor, corepressor, '(', 'NCoR)', and, silencing, mediator, of, retinoid, and, thyroid, hormone, receptors, '(', 'SMRT),', to, recruit, a, complex, containing, histone, deacetylase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'NCoR', and, 'SMRT', share, significant, differences, in, the, their, two]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptor-interacting', domains, '(', 'IDs),', suggesting, that, they, may, recruit, receptors, with, different, affinities])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, role, of, the, receptor, complex]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, a, response, element, has, not, been, fully, evaluated, in, its, ability, to, recruit, separate, corepressors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, in, this]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, proximal, 'ID', in, 'NCoR', and, 'SMRT,', which, share, only, 23, '%', 'homology,', allows, preferential, recognition, of, nuclear, 'receptors,', such, that, 'TR', prefers, to, recruit, 'NCoR,', and, 'RAR', prefers, to, recruit, 'SMRT,', to, 'DNA', response, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', mutations, in, the, 'TR']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, syndromes, of, resistance, to, thyroid, hormone, can, change, the, corepressor, recruited, by, changing, the, complex, '(', homodimer, or, 'heterodimer)', formed, on, the, 'TRE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, the, corepressor, complex]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([can, be, both, nuclear, 'receptor-', and, receptor, 'complex-specific'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Proteins', belonging, to, the, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3, family]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, various, regulatory, proteins, involved, in, cellular, 'signaling,', cell, cycle, 'regulation,', or, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto([14, -, -, 3, -, 3, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, suggested, to, act, by, regulating, the, 'cytoplasmic/nuclear', localization, of, their, target, proteins, or, by, acting, as, molecular, scaffolds, or, chaperones])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, overexpression, of, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3, enhances, the, transcriptional, activity, of, the, glucocorticoid, receptor, '(', 'GR),', which, is, a, member, of, the, nuclear, receptor, family])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, nuclear, receptor, corepressor, 'RIP140'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', transfection, 'assays,', 'RIP140', antagonizes, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3, -]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['GR', transactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we, also, observed, that, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3, can]), verbo([bind]), complemento([various, other, nuclear, receptors, and, cofactors])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3, -, mediated, intracellular, relocalization, of, the, 'GR', corepressor, 'RIP140', might, be, a, novel, mechanism, to, enhance, glucocorticoid, responsiveness, of, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', furthermore, indicate, a, more, general, role, for, 14, -, -, 3, -, 3, protein, by, influencing, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([availability, of, nuclear, 'receptor-associated', cofactors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Originally', called, retinoid, 'X', receptor]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([protein, 14, '(', 'RIP14),', the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', was, renamed, after, the, ability, of, its, rat, form, to, bind, 'supra-physiological', concentrations, of, farnesol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Strongly']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, liver, and, 'intestine,', 'FXR', has, been, shown, to, be, the, master, transcriptional, regulator, of, several, 'entero-hepatic', metabolic, pathways, with, relevance, to, the, pathophysiology, of, conditions, such, as, 'cholestasis,', fatty, liver, 'disease,', cholesterol, gallstone, 'disease,', intestinal, inflammation, and, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', given, the, importance, of, 'FXR', in, the, 'gut-liver', axis, feedbacks]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([lipid, and, glucose, 'homeostasis,', 'FXR', modulation, appears, to, have, great, input, in, diseases, such, as, metabolic, syndrome, and, diabetes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Exciting', results, from, several, cellular, and, animal, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, the, impetus, to, develop, synthetic, 'FXR', ligands, as, novel, pharmacological, agents])]). relacion([sujeto(['Fourteen', years, from, its, 'discovery,', 'FXR']), verbo([has]), complemento([gone, from, bench, to, 'bedside;', a, novel, nuclear, receptor, ligand, is, going, into, clinical, use])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, '(', 'BAs)', circulate, between, the, liver, and, 'intestine,', and]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, homeostasis, of, 'glucose,', 'lipid,', and, energy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies, demonstrated, an, essential, role, of, 'BAs', in, neurological, 'diseases,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, interaction, between, 'BAs', and, the, nervous, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, showed, that, impaired, vagus, function, in, rats]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, vagotomy, resulted, in, an, increase, in, bile, flow, without, causing, liver, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', concentrations, of, unconjugated, and, 'glycine-conjugated', 'BAs', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, both, serum, and, bile, of, rats, after, 'vagotomy,', which, was, due, to, impaired, tight, junctions, and, thus, increased, passive, absorption, of, 'BAs', in, the, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Vagotomy', markedly]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, expression, of, the, 'rate-limiting', 'BA', synthetic, enzyme, 'Cyp7a1,', which, was, not, due, to, activation, of, 'Fxr-Shp', signaling, in, the, 'liver,', but, due, to, activation, of, 'Fxr-Fgf15', signaling, in, the, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', vagotomy, produced, a, 'BA', profile, in, the, bile, favorable, for, 'Fxr', activation, by]), verbo([decreasing]), complemento(['tauro-β-muricholic', 'acid,', a, natural, 'Fxr', 'antagonist,', and, increasing, 'glyco-chenodeoxycholic', 'acid,', a, natural, 'Fxr', agonist])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', the, present, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, first, comprehensive, analysis, of, the, critical, role, of, the, vagus, nerve, in, regulating, 'BA', metabolism, and, signaling, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', was, a, significant]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, levels, of, hepatic, 'damage-associated', diagnostic, 'markers,', hepatic, and, serum, bile, 'acids,', 'triglycerides,', free, fatty, 'acids,', and, total, cholesterol, levels, in, 'Fxr-null', mice, because, of, fish, oil, feeding])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, fish, oil, feeding, reverses, hepatomegaly, and, disrupted, hepatic, function, due, to, the, lack, of, 'FXR', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, activated, by, bile, acids, '(', 'BAs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'post-absorptive', 'state,', 'BAs']), verbo([bind]), complemento(['FXR', in, the, 'hepatocytes,', which, in, turn, provides, feedback, signals, on, 'BA', synthesis, and, transport, and, regulates, 'lipid,', glucose, and, amino, acid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'FXR']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, homeostat, of, all, three, classes, of, 'nutrients,', 'fats,', sugars, and, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['FXR,', by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([nutritional, 'metabolism,', represses, autophagy, in, conditions, of, nutrient, 'abundance,', and, controls, the, metabolic, needs, of, proliferative, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'FXR']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([inflammation, via, direct, effects, and, via, its, impact, on, nutrient, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', functions, indicate, that, 'FXR', is, an, attractive, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, liver, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently', obeticholic, acid, '(', 'OCA)', which, is, a, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', agonist, was, approved, by, 'FDA', to, treat, cholestatic, liver, 'diseases,', which]), verbo([provided]), complemento([us, a, novel, therapeutic, strategy, against, cholestasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', the, first, 'time,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, auraptene, '(', 'AUR),', a, natural, 'product,', can, activate, 'FXR', to, exert, hepatoprotective, effect, against, cholestatic, liver, injury, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', 'AUR', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, significantly, decrease, the, mortality, of, cholestatic, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dynamic', change, analysis, of, bile, acids, and, gene, analysis, revealed, that, 'AUR']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([bile, acid, efflux, from, liver, into, intestine, via, an, induction, in, 'FXR-target', genes, 'Bsep', and, 'Mrp2', 'expression,', and, reduced, hepatic, uptake, through, an, inhibition, in, 'Ntcp'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'AUR', reduced, bile, acid, synthesis, through]), verbo([repressing]), complemento(['FXR-target', genes, 'Cyp7a1', and, 'Cyp8b1,', and, increased, bile, acid, metabolism, through, an, induction, in, 'Sult2a1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'AUR']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([liver, repair, through, an, induction, in, liver, 'regeneration-related', 'gene,', and, suppressed, liver, inflammation, through, repressing, 'inflammation-related', gene, 'NF-κB,', 'TNF-α,', 'IL-1β', and, 'IL-6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, changes, in, these, genes, and, 'protein,', as, well, as, ameliorative, liver, histology]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'AUR', were, abrogated, by, 'FXR', antagonist, guggulsterone, in, vivo, and, 'FXR', siRNA, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'AUR', may, be, an, effective, approach, for, the, prevention, against, cholestatic, liver, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously, showed, that]), verbo([increased]), complemento([asymmetric, dimethylarginine, '(', 'ADMA)', biliary, excretion, occurs, during, hepatic, 'ischemia/reperfusion', '(', 'I/R),', prompting, us, to, study, the, effects, of, the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', agonist, obeticholic, acid, '(', 'OCA)', on, 'bile,', serum, and, tissue, levels, of, 'ADMA', after, 'I/R'])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', a, 60, min, 'reperfusion,', 'serum,', tissue, and, bile, 'ADMA', 'levels,', liver, mRNA, and, protein, expression, of, 'ADMA', transporters, '(', 'CAT-1,', 'CAT-2A,', 'CAT-2B,', 'OCT-1,', 'MATE-1),', and, enzymes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'ADMA', synthesis, '(', 'protein-arginine-N-methyltransferase-1,', 'PRMT-1)', and, metabolism, '(', 'dimethylarginine-dimethylaminohydrolase-1,', 'DDAH-1)', were, measured])]). relacion([sujeto(['OCA', administration]), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, further, increase, in, biliary, 'ADMA', levels, both, in, sham, and, 'I/R', 'groups,', with, no, significant, changes, in, hepatic, 'ADMA', content])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', reduction, in, 'CAT-1,', 'CAT-2A', or, 'CAT-2B', transcripts, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'OCA-treated', 'sham-operated', rats, compared, with, vehicle])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, marked]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'OCT-1', and, increase, in, 'MATE-1', expression, was, observed])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', reduced, mRNA, expression, of, hepatic, 'CAT', transporters]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, increase, in, serum, 'ADMA', levels, is, probably, due, to, decreased, liver, uptake, of, 'ADMA', from, the, systemic, circulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', the, mechanism]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, further, increasing, biliary, 'ADMA', levels, in, sham, and, 'I/R', groups, treated, with, 'OCA', appears, to, be, 'MATE-1-dependent'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', objective, of, this, study, was, to, prepare, an, extract, from, dates, and, determine, whether, it]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, ligand, for, the, farnesoid, x, receptor, '(', 'FXR),', a, nuclear, receptor, important, for, maintaining, triglyceride, and, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Extracts', were, tested, to, determine, their, ability, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([nuclear, 'receptor-mediated', transactivation, using, transient, transfection])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', effect, of, 'DPE', on, 'FXR-target', genes]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([bile, acid, absorption, and, transport, was, then, assessed, in, 'vitro,', in, 'Caco-2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Characterization']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'DPE', is, a, rich, source, of, polyphenols, including, hydroxycinnamic, 'acids,', 'proanthocyanidins,', and, lipohilic, 'polyphenols,', and, comprises, 13, '%', proanthocyanidins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transactivation', results, show, that, 'DPE']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, 'co-agonist', ligand, for, both, mouse, and, human, 'FXR,', wherein, it, activates, bile, 'acid-bound', 'FXR', greater, than, that, seen, with, bile, acid, alone])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', 'DPE', alone]), verbo([activated]), complemento([a, peroxisome, proliferator, activated, receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARα)', chimera, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistent', with, 'DPE', as, a, 'co-agonist', ligand, for, 'FXR,', studies, in, 'Caco-2', cells]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'co-incubation', with, bile, 'acid,', 'dose-dependently', enhances, the, expression, of, fibroblast, growth, factor, 19, '(', 'FGF19),', compared, to, treatment, with, bile, acid, alone])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'DPE']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([bile, 'acid-induced', expression, of, ileal, bile, acid, binding, protein, '(', 'IBABP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, that, 'DPE']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, potent, 'co-agonist', ligand, for, 'FXR,', and, that, it, differentially, regulates, 'FXR-target', gene, expression, in, vitro, in, human, intestinal, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([novel, insight, into, a, potential, mechanism, by, which, dates, may, exert, a, hypotriglyceridemic, effect, via, 'FXR', and, modulation, of, bile, acid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Progress', in, this, field]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, strongly, limited, by, the, lack, of, appropriate, methods, for, the, preparation, of, pure, glucuronides, in, the, amount, needed, for, biological, and, pharmacological, studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, new, synthesis, of, bile, acid, 'C3-glucuronides', enabling, the, convenient, preparation, of, 'gram-scale', quantities])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([compounds, have, been, characterized, in, terms, of, physicochemical, properties, and, abilities, to, modulate, key, nuclear, receptors, including, the, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'particular,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'C3-glucuronides', of, chenodeoxycholic, acid, and, lithocholic, 'acid,', respectively, the, most, abundant, and, potentially, cytotoxic, species, formed, in, patients, affected, by, 'cholestasis,', behave, as, 'FXR', agonists, and, positively, regulate, the, gene, expression, of, transporter, 'proteins,', the, function, of, which, is, critical, in, human, conditions, related, to, imbalances, of, bile, acid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Impaired', regulation, of, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', homeostasis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, be, associated, with, adverse, metabolic, consequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', to, 'HFD', 'mice,', the, concentration, of, total, 'BAs', in, liver, was, higher, in, unDCD, and, 'DCD', 'mice,', due, to]), verbo([increased]), complemento([intestinal, 'BA', absorption])]). relacion([sujeto(['DCD', mice, tended, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([higher, 'BA', concentrations, in, both, liver, and, ileum, than, unDCD, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consequently,', 'DCD', mice, had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([basolateral, 'BA', efflux, '(', 'Ostα,', 'Ostβ,', and, 'Mrp4)', and, decreased, 'BA', synthesis, '(', 'Cyp7a1,', 'Cyp8b1,', and, 'Cyp7b1)', in, the, liver, as, well, as, activated, 'Fxr-Fgf15', signaling, in, the, ileum])]). relacion([sujeto(['DCD', mice, also, had]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['BA', hydroxylation, '(', 'Cyp3a11)', and, 'BA', sulfation, '(', 'Sult2a1)', in, the, liver, compared, to, 'HFD', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, bacterial, community, composition, was, altered, in, the, cecum, of, 'DCD', 'mice,', characterized, with, a, marked]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Defferribacteres', and, 'Candidatus', 'Saccharibacteria'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', the, present, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, first, comprehensive, analysis, of, 'BA', homeostasis, in, 'DCD', 'mice,', and, revealed, a, potential, role, of, 'BAs', in, 'DCD', development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Evaluating', whether, changes, in, gut, microbiota]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, a, bifidobacterial, strain, may, have, an, effect, on, the, hepatic, vascular, function, in, portal, hypertensive, cirrhotic, rats])]). relacion([sujeto([pseudocatenulatum, 'CECT7765', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([proteobacteria, '(', p, =, 0.001, ')', and, increased, 'Bacteroidetes', '(', p, =, 0.001, ')', relative, abundance])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bifidobacteria]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, 'Firmicutes/Bacteroidetes', ratio, in, the, 'BDL', model, '(', p, =, 0.03, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['BDL', with, bifidobacteria, vs, 'BDL', rats, 'showed:', significantly, reduced, portal, vein, 'area,', portal, 'flow,', congestion, 'index,', alkaline, phosphatase, and, total, 'bilirubin,', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([serum, cytokines, and, nitric, oxide, 'levels,', gene, expression, levels, of, bile, acids, receptor, 'FXR', and, endothelial, nitric, oxide, synthase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Quantitative', changes, in, the, 'Clostridiales', and, 'Bacteroidales', orders, were, independently]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, variations, in, complemento([with, alkaline, phosphatase, in, the, 'ANCOVA', analysis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hemodynamic', alterations, and, liver, dysfunction]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'BDL', in, rats, are, partially, restored, after, oral, administration, of, 'B'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results']), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, 'proof-of-concept', for, the, beneficial, effect, of, this, bifidobacterial, strain, in, reducing, complications, derived, from, portal, hypertension, in, cirrhosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Inflammation']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, recognized, role, in, 'non-alcoholic', fatty, liver, disease, '(', 'NAFLD)', progression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mice', were, fed, a, 'HFD', to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['NAFLD,', 'then,', treated, with, the, 'FXR', ligand, obeticholic, acid, '(', 'OCA)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['OCA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, expression, of, several, hepatic, 'Cyp450', 'epoxygenases,', the, enzymes, responsible, for, 'EET', 'synthesis,', and, mitigated, 'HFD-induced', hepatic, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'vitro,', induction, of, 'CYP450', epoxygenases, was, sufficient, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['NF-kB', signaling, and, cell, migration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', activation, reprogramed, arachidonate, metabolism, by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['CYP450', epoxygenase, expression, and, 'EET', production])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'vitro,', 'FXR-mediated', 'NF-kB', 'inhibition,']), verbo([required]), complemento([active, 'CYP450', epoxygenases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Emerging', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, 'FXR', activation, ameliorates, the, development, of, alcoholic, liver, diseases, '(', complemento([susceptibility, to, 'ALD', development, in, 'FXR-/-', mice, is, due, to, deficiency, of, hepatic, 'FXR', or, increased, toxicity, secondary, to, increased, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', tissues, 'and/or']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['BA', levels, resultant, from, 'whole-body', 'FXR', deficiency, might, be, responsible, for, more, severe, 'ALD', development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Renal', medullary, cells]), verbo([have]), complemento([to, survive, high, medullary, osmolarity, during, antidiuresis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', study]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', a, nuclear, receptor, transcription, factor, activated, by, endogenous, bile, 'acids,', increases, urine, concentrating, ability, by, verbo([caused]), complemento([a, massive, apoptosis, of, 'MCDs', in, both, global, 'FXR', 'gene-deficient', mice, and, collecting, 'duct-specific', 'FXR', knockout, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, studies, showed, that, hypertonicity, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['FXR', and, tonicity, response, enhancer, binding, protein, '(', 'TonEBP)', expression, in, mIMCD3, cell, under, hyperosmotic, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'FXR', can]), verbo([increase]), complemento([gene, expression, and, nuclear, translocation, of, 'TonEBP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'FXR', protects, 'MCDs', from, 'hypertonicity-induced', cell, injury, very, likely, via]), verbo([increasing]), complemento(['TonEBP', expression, and, nuclear, translocation])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([insights, into, the, molecular, mechanism, by, which, 'FXR', enhances, urine, concentration, via, maintaining, cell, viability, of, 'MCDs', under, hyperosmotic, condition])]). relacion([sujeto(['Farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', is, a, member, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, family, involved, in, multiple, physiological, processes, through, regulating, specific, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', critical, role, of, 'FXR', as, a, transcriptional, regulator, makes, it, a, promising]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, diverse, 'diseases,', especially, those, related, to, metabolic, disorders, such, as, diabetes, and, cholestasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,', the, two, representative, compounds, shared, low, topological, similarities, with, other]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['FXR', antagonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['According', to, the, putative]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['poses,', the, molecular, basis, of, these, antagonists, against, 'FXR', was, also, elucidated, in, this, report])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', primary, cilia, are, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['microtubule-based', cellular, organelles, that, perceive, metabolic, status, and, thus, link, the, sensory, system, to, cellular, signaling, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', ciliogenesis, is, thought, to, be, tightly, linked, to, 'autophagy,', which, is, also]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'nutrient-sensing', transcription, 'factors,', such, as, 'PPARA', '(', peroxisome, proliferator, activated, receptor, 'alpha)', and, 'NR1H4/FXR', '(', nuclear, receptor, subfamily, 1, ',', group, 'H,', member, 4, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, relationship, between, these, factors, and, ciliogenesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, clearly, demonstrated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', 'PPARA-induced', ciliogenesis, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, controlling, 'autophagy,', since, either, pharmacological, or, genetic, inactivation, of, autophagy, significantly, repressed, ciliogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we, showed, that, pharmacological, activator, of, 'autophagy,', 'rapamycin,', recovered]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([ciliogenesis, in, 'ppara-/-', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', activation, of, 'NR1H4']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([cilia, 'formation,', while, knockdown, of, 'NR1H4', enhanced, ciliogenesis, by, inducing, autophagy])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', reciprocal, activities, of, 'PPARA', and, 'NR1H4', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([ciliogenesis, were, and, 'NR1H4', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([ciliogenesis, were, examined, in, greater, detail, in, 'ppara-/-', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', response, to, 'starvation,', ciliogenesis, was, facilitated, in, 'wild-type', mice, via]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([autophagy, in, 'kidney,', while, 'ppara-/-', mice, displayed, impaired, autophagy, and, kidney, damage, resembling, ciliopathy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', an, 'NR1H4', agonist, exacerbated, kidney, damage]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, starvation, in, 'ppara-/-', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, a, previously, unknown, role, for, 'PPARA', and, 'NR1H4', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, 'autophagy-ciliogenesis', axis, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Anti-inflammation', drug, 'Cenicriviroc,', on, the, other, 'hand,', markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([inflammation, and, hepatocyte, 'degeneration,', and, mildly, decreased, liver, 'fibrosis,', but, exhibited, no, effect, on, hepatic, 'steatosis/macrovesicular', vacuolation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([the, progression, of, 'NASH', hepatic, 'steatosis/macrovesicular', 'vacuolation,', and, inflammation, eventually, lead, to, hepatocyte, death, and, fibrosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', fibrosis, is, known, to, be, an, independent, risk, for, decompensated, 'cirrhosis,', cardiovascular, 'events,', and, 'mortality,', our, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, effective, 'anti-fibrosis', therapy, should, be, an, essential, component, of, the, combined, pharmacotherapy, for, advanced, 'NASH'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, are, thought, to, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, retinoic, acid, '(', 'RA)', receptors, and, the, retinoid, 'X', receptors, '(', 'RXRs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, an, additional, 'retinoid-activated', receptor, that, is, neither, a, retinoic, acid, receptors, nor, an, 'RXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['RXR-interacting', protein, 14, '(', 'RIP14),', a, recently, described, orphan, member, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'superfamily,', can, be, activated, by, either, 'all-trans-RA', '(', 'tRA)', or, the, synthetic, retinoid, 'TTNPB', '[', '[', 'E]-4-[2-(5,', 6, ',', 7, ',', 8, -, 'tetrahydro-5,', 5, ',', 8, ',', 8, -, 'tetramethyl-2-naphthalenyl)propen-1-yl]benzoic', 'acid]'])]). relacion([sujeto(['RIP14']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'DNA', as, a, heterodimer, with, 'RXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', of, the, 'ligand-dependent', transcriptional, activation, functions, indicate, that, 'TTNPB']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'RIP14', component, of, the, 'RIP14-RXR', 'heterodimer,', that, 9, -, 'cis-RA', and, 'LG1069', activate, 'RXR,', and, that, tRA, activates, via, both, 'RIP14', and, 'RXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', the, very, effective, activation, of, 'RIP14', by, tRA, or, 'TTNPB,', relatively, high, concentrations, of, these, compounds, are, 'required,', and, no, evidence, for, direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, either, compound, was, obtained, using, several, approaches])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RIP14', is, the, receptor, for, an, 'as-yet-unidentified', retinoid, metabolite])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, show, that, the, high, fat, diet, or, palmitic, acid, treatment, significantly]), verbo([increase]), complemento([hepatic, 'miR-194', levels, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', dual, luciferase, 'assay,', we, demonstrate, that, 'miR-194', directly]), offspring])]). relacion([sujeto(['Male', born, to, hypercholesterolemic, mothers, showed, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Scarb1', and, 'Ldlr', gene, expression, compared, with, male, born, 'aquaporin-2', mRNA, but, mislocalized, expression, of, 'aquaporin-2', protein, in, the, cytoplasm, of, 'CD', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutant', kidneys, also, had]), verbo([decreased]), that, is, required, for, maximal, urinary, concentration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, and, sequencing, experiments, revealed, 'HNF-1β']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, role, of, 'HNF-1β', in, osmoregulation, and, identify, multiple, 'mechanisms,', whereby, mutations, of, 'HNF-1β', produce, defects, in, urinary, concentration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, mouse, liver, 'CRMs', involved, in, regulatory, activities, of, the, hepatic, 'TR,', 'NR1H4', '(', 'FXR;', 'analyses,', we]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, logical, organization, where, 'trans-regulatory', modules, '(', 'TRMs),', which, consist, of, subsets, of, preferentially, and, coordinately, complemento([across, the, whole, landscape, of, 'CRMs,', to, discriminate, promoters, from, enhancers])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', combinations, also, specify, distinct, sets, of, 'CRM', differentially, organized, along, the, genome, and]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, regulation, of, either, 'housekeeping/cellular', maintenance, genes, or, 'liver-specific', functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, these, 'TRMs', which, we, define, as, 'obligatory,', we, show, that, facultative, 'TRMs,', such, as, one, comprising, core, circadian, 'TRs,', are, further]), principles, of, concerted, transcriptional, regulation, by, multiple, 'TRs', at, 'CRMs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Eculizumab-treated', paroxysmal, nocturnal, hemoglobinuria, '(', 'PNH)', patients, '(', '[', range, 26, -, 68, '\240\years])', out, of, the, 174, pts, with, 'PNH/-clone', at, our, department, due, to, a, persistent]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, total, bilirubin, concentrations, '(', median, 3.4, '\240\mg/dL;', range, 2.1, -, 8.1, '\240\mg/dL)', during, chronic, eculizumab, treatment, and, 'normal/or', slightly, increased, serum, aminotransferase, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'A(TA)7', 'TAA', variant, in, the, 'UGT1A1', promoter]), verbo([causing]), complemento(['Gilbert', syndrome, was, detected, in, three, pts, '(', 5, /, 8, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Progressive', familial, intrahepatic, cholestasis, '(', 'PFIC)', is, a, genetically, heterogeneous, disorder, of, bile, flow, disruption, due, to, abnormal, canalicular, transport, or, impaired, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', 'metabolism,']), verbo([causing]), complemento([excess, 'BA', accumulation, and, liver, failure])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([reported]), complemento([an, intrahepatic, cholestasis, mouse, model, based, on, loss, of, function, of, both, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR;', 'NR1H4)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)', '(', 'DKO),', which, has, strong, similarities, to, human, 'PFIC', type, 5])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', models, exhibit, severe, hepatomegaly, and, hepatic, 'BA', 'accumulation,', but, 'DKO', show, higher, circulating, 'BA', and, liver, 'injury,', whereas, 'Bsep-/-']), verbo([have]), complemento([milder, phenotypes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transcriptomic', and, proteomic, analysis, revealed, specific, activation, of, 'CA', synthesis, and, alternative, basolateral, 'BA', transport, in, 'DKO,', but]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CDCA', synthesis, and, canalicular, transport, in, 'Bsep-/-'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CAR/PXR-CYP2B/CYP2C', axis, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, 'DKO', 'livers,', but, not, in, other, cholestasis, models])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, this, axis, in, 'Fxr:Shp:Car:Pxr', quadruple, knockouts, blocked, 'Cyp2b/Cyp2c', gene, 'induction,', impaired, bilirubin, 'conjugation/elimination,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([liver, injury])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, 'FXR/SHP', results, in, distinct, molecular, pathogenesis, and, 'CAR/PXR', 'activation,', which]), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['Cyp2b/Cyp2c', gene, transcription, and, bilirubin, 'clearance;', 'CAR/PXR', activation, is, not, observed, in, 'Bsep-/-', mice, or, 'PFIC2', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', result]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, deeper, understanding, of, the, heterogeneity, of, intrahepatic, cholestasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', levels, are, strictly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([to, maintain, its, 'homeostasis;', 'therefore,', if, it, is, not, absorbed, with, the, 'diet,', the, cholesterol, biosynthetic, pathway, is, enhanced, and, vice, versa])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nowadays,', the, commonly, prescribed, therapeutic, treatments, for, hypocholesterolemic, patients, are]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([toward, the, reduction, of, both, cholesterol, intestinal, absorption, 'and/or', its, endogenous, biosynthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Marketed', foods, supplemented, with, hypocholesterolemic, compounds, are, only]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([mechanisms, for, cholesterol, absorption, '(', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', certain, fungal, extracts, obtained, from, edible, mushrooms, might, be, able, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([cholesterol, levels, by, both, 'strategies,', pharmaceutical, drugs, and, functional, foods])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, and, in, vivo, studies, indicated, that, fungal, sterols, 'down-regulated', genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, homeostasis, '(', such, as, 'Srebf2', and, 'Nr1h4', '(', 'FXR))', and, other, specific, mushroom, 'drugs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', and, other, observations]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, hypocholesterolemic, effect, of, mushroom, extracts, could, be, due, to, transcriptional, and, 'post-transcriptional', modulations, besides, other, indirect, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR,', 'NR1H4)', is, a, member, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, superfamily, of, 'ligand-activated', transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'FXR', deficiency]), verbo([increases]), complemento([osteoclast, formation, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['First,', 'FXR', deficiency, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, accelerate, osteoclast, formation, via, complemento([that, interference, of, 'IFN-β', expression, by, 'FXR', deficiency, impaired, the, downstream, 'JAK3-STAT1', signaling, 'pathways,', which, in, turn, increased, osteoclast, formation])]). 'protein-dependent', and, 'β-arrestin-mediated', pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', 'specifically,', the, role, of, 'SHP-1', in, the, 'G(i/o)', 'protein-dependent', pathway, was, demonstrated, by, the, fact, that, the, overexpression, of, a, catalytically, defective, 'SHP-1', augments, tyrosine, phosphorylation, of, the, 'PI3K', regulatory, subunit, 'p85,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, an, increase, in, the, phosphorylation, of, cSrc, and, 'phosphoinositide-dependent', protein, kinase, 1, ',', and, finally, activating, 'Akt'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', presence, of, 'SHP-1', in, the, 'β-arrestin-scaffolded', complex, and, its, attenuating, effect, on, the, cSrc, and, 'Akt', activities, verified, that, 'SHP-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([not, only, verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['SHP-1', phosphorylation, in, 3, 'T3-L1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'ghrelin-induced', 'Akt', activity, was, enhanced, secretion, in, human, hepatocarcinoma, 'HepG2', cells, and, had, and, hypotriglyceridemic, effect, in, 'wild-type', mouse])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', in, mouse, 'liver,', 'GSPE', complemento(['ApoB', 'secretion,', but, in, a, 'SHP-independent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'SHP', is, a, key, mediator, of, the, hypotriglyceridemic, response]), complemento([bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', metabolism, during, fasting, or, feeding])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study, showed, that, 40, '%', 'CR']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, 'BA', pool, the, nuclear, receptor, '(', 'NR)', superfamily, and, are, so, named, because, their, endogenous, physiological, ligands, are, either, unknown, or, may, not, exist])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'SHP', 'down-regulates', 'TLR4', signaling, pathway, to, reduce, osteolysis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, titanium, particles, via, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, experimental, models])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', due, to, the, low, specificity, of, these, 'tests,', new, alternative, biomarkers, such, as, deregulated, 'RNAs', and, microRNAs]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implemented])]). relacion([sujeto(['Aberrant', expressions, of, small, heterodimer, partner, gene, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)', and, 'mir-141', are]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, various, cancers])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, could, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'AR', via, 'down-regulation', of, its, 'co-repressor', 'protein,', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mttp', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, carbohydrate, response, element, binding, protein, '(', 'ChREBP)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', it, is, unclear, whether, both, coordinately]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['Mttp', expression, and, 'VLDL', secretion])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', adenoviral, overexpression, of, 'ChREBP', and, 'SHP', in, rat, primary, hepatocytes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([and, suppressed, 'Mttp', 'mRNA,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'ChREBP,', rather, than, 'SHP,', regulates, 'VLDL', secretion, under, normal, conditions, and, that, 'ChREBP', and, 'SHP', do, not, affect, the, transcriptional, activities, of, each, other])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', article, is, a]), verbo([report]), complemento([on, a, symposium, entitled, '"', 'Physiological', 'Regulation', of, 'Drug', 'Metabolism', and, 'Transport"', sponsored, by, the, 'American', 'Society', for, 'Pharmacology', and, 'Experimental', 'Therapeutics', and, held, at, the, 'Experimental', 'Biology', 2017, meeting, in, 'Chicago,', 'IL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', contributions, of, physiologic, and, pathophysiological, regulation, of, 'drug-metabolizing', enzymes, and, transporters, to, interindividual, variability, in, drug, metabolism, are, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([but, in, many, cases, are, not, well, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['CYP2D6', transgenic, mice, were, used, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, the, mechanism, of, regulation, of, this, enzyme, in, 'pregnancy,', via, hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 4, 'α,', small, heterodimer, 'partner,', and, retinoids])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bile, acid]), verbo([activated]), complemento([transcription, factor, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', regulates, numerous, metabolic, processes, and, is, a, rising, target, for, the, treatment, of, hepatic, and, metabolic, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['FXR', agonists]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, efficacy, in, treating, 'non-alcoholic', steatohepatitis, '(', 'NASH),', diabetes, and, dyslipidemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, characterize, imatinib, as, 'first-in-class', allosteric, 'FXR', modulator, and]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, development, of, an, optimized, descendant, that, markedly, promotes, agonist, induced, 'FXR', activation, in, a, reporter, gene, assay, and, 'FXR', target, gene, expression, in, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Differential', effects, of, imatinib, on, 'agonist-induced', bile, salt, export, protein, and, small, heterodimer, partner, expression]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, allosteric, 'FXR', modulation, could, open, a, new, avenue, to, 'gene-selective', 'FXR', modulators])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', abnormality, of, the, main, intestinal, fructose, transporter, proteins]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed, as, a, cause, for, fructose, malabsorption])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, investigated, whether, carbohydrate, response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'ChREBP)', plays, a, role, in, intestinal, fructose, absorption, through, the, regulation, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fructose, transport, and, metabolism, and, ion, transport])]). relacion([sujeto(['Body', weight, and, food, intake, were, 'measured,', signs, of, fructose, malabsorption, were, 'monitored,', and, the, expression, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fructose, 'transport/metabolism', and, ion, transport, was, evaluated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chrebp', 'KO', mice, fed, the, control, diet]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([a, constant, body, 'weight,', whereas, those, fed, a, 'HFrD', showed, significant, weight, loss, within, 3, -, 5, days])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'Chrebp', 'KO', mice, fed, the, 'HFrD', exhibited, a, markedly, distended, cecum, and, proximal, colon, containing, both, fluid, and, 'gas,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([incomplete, fructose, absorption])]). relacion([sujeto(['Fructose-induced']), verbo([increases]), complemento([of, genes, involved, in, fructose, transport, '(', 'GLUT5),', fructose, metabolism, '(', 'fructokinase,', aldolase, 'B,', 'triokinase,', and, lactate, 'dehydrogenase),', and, gluconeogenesis, '(', 'glucose-6-phosphatase', and, 'fructose-1,6-bisphosphatase)', were, observed, in, the, intestine, of, 'WT', but, not, of, 'Chrebp', 'KO', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover', the, 'Na+/H+', exchanger, 'NHE3,', which, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Na+', and, water, absorption, in, the, 'intestine,', was, significantly, decreased, in, 'HFrD-fed', 'Chrebp', 'KO', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ectopic', 'co-expression', of, 'ChREBP', and, its, heterodimer, partner, 'Max-like', protein, 'X']), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'Glut5', promoter, in, 'Caco-2BBE', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['ChREBP', plays, a, key, role, in, the, dietary, fructose, transport, as, well, as, conversion, into, lactate, and, glucose, through, direct, transcriptional, control, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, fructose, 'transport,', 'fructolysis,', and, gluconeogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', ablation, of, 'Chrebp', results, in, a, severe, diarrhea, in, mice, fed, a, 'high-fructose', 'diet,', which, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, insufficient, induction, of, 'GLUT5', in, the, intestine])]).
